programme.title: Expedition Unknown
programme.desc: American archaeologist, author and explorer Josh Gates explores the world to solve longstanding mysteries and legends that are yet to be solved. With no story too big, Josh travels across the globe to identify clues and secrets that could help him find the truth. First he must gather as much information about the case, before jetting off to pursue his leads. Whether its uncovering long lost Nazi treasures, unearthing the birth place of Jesus, deciphering the origin of Stonehenge or investigating the Vikings rise to power, Josh leaves no stone unturned in his quest for answers.

programme.title: Mystery Of Blind Frog Ranch
programme.desc: Locals say that Bling Frog Ranch in Utah is a cursed land, a place that should not been interfered with, a place where strange things just seem to happen. Rumours have long circulated about a lost treasure hidden somewhere on the ranch, and that the mysterious land is trying to hold on to something. This reality series follows Duane Ollinger as he throws everything he has at finding its hidden treasures, but every time he thinks he close, another peculiar incident arises.

programme.title: Alien Encounters: Fact or Fiction
programme.desc: A man captures a beam of light in the desert. A couple is convinced they communicated with a UFO. A military man thinks he has found a portal.

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Each week, a new pair of total strangers are faced with the ultimate survival challenge: survive for 21 days together with no clothes or supplies in some of the most dangerous environments in the world. In addition to the landscape itself working against the duo, the local wildlife stalk them as well. Of course, the biggest complication for any of the couples might end up being their own clashing egos. Will they make it out alive, or will they fall victim to the wilderness? They must fall back on their most primal instincts to ensure they dont become prey themselves.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard and Paul Cowland travel across the United Kingdom to uncover classic cars to buy, restore and sell on for a profit. The pair scour garages, barns and facilities to discover collectible cars which include the likes of the Morris Minor Traveller, Jaguar XJS, Rover P6 and a BMW 635 CSI among many others. The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

programme.title: Salvage Dawgs
programme.desc: Mike Whiteside and Robert Kulp are the hosts of Salvage Dawgs show that is about saving beautiful old things from buildings planned to be torn down. They and their talented crew teach the viewers how to repurpose old stuff into something new and useful instead of throwing it away. So if you are remodeling your home think twice before you get rid of anything. Get creative, have some fun and learn tips and tricks to help you build your skills. Learn how to transform old chairs into a functional bench, how to repurpose an old paneled door into a shelf and enjoy fantastic vintage pieces from the past.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Baggage Battles
programme.desc: Featuring professional buyers including antique dealers, a production designer and an eCommerce expert, these expert buyers travel around the world to lost baggage auctions, estate auctions and police auctions to find the hidden treasure and items left behind or siezed by customs in order to make the greatest profit. This American docu-reality series created by The Travel Channel in 2012. Finding contents in baggage such as a bronze sculpture, jewellery including 18 karat gold and a legendary belt, these professionals prove why they have a name for themselves in their industry, finding hidden gems in hidden places.

programme.title: Shed and Buried
programme.desc: Motorbike enthusiast Henry Cole and expert Sam Lovegrove travel around the UK to explore peoples sheds searching for some automotive bargains. They purchase all kinds of old cars, bikes, jeeps, tractors and other vehicles in order to renovate them and sell after the rehabilitation work is over. The old vehicles are restored and given second life. It is a risky business and the two always wonder if they manage to make profit this time.

programme.desc: When a monster derecho spawns destructive tornadoes across Texas, a weather spotter must race to save a young family whose house took a direct hit.

programme.title: Inside the Heist
programme.desc: With meticulous attention to detail, and a bluff that fools the police, an Argentinian artist plans the perfect bank robbery using the sewers beneath a city.

programme.title: The Autobahn A2
programme.desc: One of Europes busiest, most dangerous and most important highways. For many people its their place of work, and many more use it to travel across Europe.

programme.title: The Autobahn A2
programme.desc: One of Europes busiest, most dangerous and most important highways. For many people its their place of work, and many more use it to travel across Europe.

programme.title: Crimes Gone Viral
programme.desc: Todays world is watched by billions of cameras; CCTV, dash cams, home surveillance and mobile phones capture crazy incidents every day. This documentary series examines clips that exploded on the internet, the videos that amassed millions of views to become viral. Break-ins, car chases, angry confrontations; Crimes Gone Viral has it all. And not satisfied with just the clips, the show delves deeper into the story behind each video with interviews and insider information.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Gold Rush is a reality television series that follows the placer gold mining efforts of various family-run mining companies in boundless north of America. The series focuses on the work process in the conditions of permafrost and working relations between the participants. The show has 10 seasons altogether. In some episodes participants start the adventure and travel to Alaska to search for gold because of financial issues. They do not have any previous experience and have to learn on the job. Then there appears several gold mining teams that compete with each other. In some episodes the teams move to South America. Admire the courage and determination of the team members in their unstoppable desire to become rich.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: For over 24 years, East Timor (now known as Timor Leste) endured a crushing occupation inflicted on them by neighbouring Indonesia on the pretext of the fight against communism. The war was brought to a controversial conclusion in 1999. However, trauma from that period lives on as evidenced by the testimonies of Nelson Belo, Gregorio Saldanha and Pascal Oliveira, survivors of the infamous 1991 Santa Cruz Massacre. This film recalls the trauma of Timor Leste in this the tenth anniversary of its independence.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Desperate Hours
programme.desc: Disasters in the air and misfortunes at sea grab our attention because of the unusually large number of fatalities involved. But its not even necessary to leave dry land for a terrible disaster to happen. Rail journeys and even just getting in your car can be fraught with disaster. Thats the focus for this instalment of Desperate Hours – road and rail disasters. We will examine the causes of such accidents, be that the powers of nature or human folly. We are about to explore the worst of the worst destructive events from an ordinary day on Nigerian roads to a disastrous display of human error in Santiago de Compostella when the driver of a loaded passenger train went about 115 km/h over the established speed limit and drove his train straight into a wall. So buckle up; youre in for a bumpy ride…

programme.title: Desperate Hours
programme.desc: Life on planet Earth is a fragile enough proposition as it is. The Earth is an interconnected system, everything is dependent on everything else, and we as a species should learn how to avoid making things worse than they need to be. In this rather sobering instalment of Desperate Hours our special focus is on Environmental Disasters. We will explore what has actually been done to protect the environment in contrast to the long discussions on this topic. From polluting the planet in various ways to the effects of global warming we contemplate how our future might be affected. As custodians of the planet, are we not better to be safe, rather than sorry?

programme.title: Yemen, Chaos in Silence
programme.desc: After three years of war, Yemen is facing its worst humanitarian crisis since the end of World War II. Yemen, chaos in silence"" is an unprecedented journey that tells the story of a conflict that is unfolding virtually without outside witnesses. From Aden in the south to Sanaa in the north, via Taez, the front line, this film explores a devastated country, eroded by political and religious divisions and ravaged by cholera.

programme.title: Perception and Reality: The Magic of Science
programme.desc: Our film follows researchers who are bringing magicians tricks into the laboratory. With impossible magic, amazing facts, and opportunities for viewers to participate in the magic tricks, this extraordinary exploration peeks behind the curtain into a fascinating world where ancient magic meets modern science. Magician Julie Eng not only mystifies us with magic, she also takes us to Montreals McGill University to meet Jay Olson who is using card tricks to study consciousness. His research also includes an MRI machine that can apparently not only read minds, but also manipulate thoughts. In the US we meet with professor Anthony Barnhart. Hes a magician turned scientist who is using magic principles to investigate why we sometimes dont see whats right under our noses. We also meet Professor Amory Danek who is using the conjurors craft to study creativity and problem solving.Professor Ronald Rensink at the University of British Columbia discovered how small distractions can blind drivers to obvious dangers. These studies naturally led him to work with magicians to explore possible new experiments.In London England Gustav Kuhn conducts a study that tracks the eye movements of the magicians audience. We see tricks that fool us despite nothing actually happening, as well as demonstrations that reveal we can be blind even to our own choices. Colourful and compelling, our film takes a critical and engaging look at the fascinating facts revealed when you see the human mind through the eyes of a magician.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: From the elite ex-special forces personnel in charge of guarding heads of state in conﬂ ict zones to the two-person teams that protect CEOs in dangerous regions, modern-day bodyguards must be well versed in close quarter battle techniques. An immense amount of planning and preparation is involved in each operation. From air travel, car convoys and helicopter shuttles to basic foot traﬃc, a close protection squad must be completely tuned to the Who, What, Where and When of any given situation. This episode of CQB focuses on the complex day-to-day and minute-to-minute operations of these elite teams and the highly developed techniques they employ.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: The team head to Tutbury Castle in Derbyshire to investigate the paranormal reports at the location. Past Hunters appear to have caught the Tutbury Ghost on camera.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Built in 1861 Mill Street Barracks is steeped in rich history. It has accommodated many branches of the armed forces throughout its life. Like many other barracks it has also been used as a morgue making it a prime location for the supernatural.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We visit Canadas capital city on a hill in Ottawa, Ontario. Well sail down the famous Rideau Canal locks. We go deep into Ottawas cold war history at the Diefenbunker, as well as, explore Canadas military history at the Canadian War Museum. Then we head up the Peace Tower and take a look at the library of Parliament. Finally, we learn about Canadas first nations tribes at the Canadian History Museum.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: If there ever was a lost wildlife gem, it would be Mikumi. Here many of the Big Twelve live their lives against the backdrop of one of the most scenic parks in Africa. Bill takes a break from the wildlife safari to investigate the huge salt works at the edge of the park and how it may impact future conservation.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: In this first of a two-parter on the Mara, we follow the migration in anticipation of the famous river crossings. We find all three big cats and hyena waiting for their chance to get their share of the migrants. During migration, the animal numbers are staggering.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: In the middle of the Indian Ocean, 2000 kilometres from the east coast of Africa, 800 east of Madagascar, and 220 north-east of Reunion, is the island of Mauritius, a volcanic island where different races, cultures, religions, colours and spices all live together in harmony. We visit the Ile Aix Aigrettes, a nature reserve that protects rare and interesting species such as the pink pigeon, giant tortoises, orchids and native lizards. This small island is the jewel in the crown of the Mauritius Wildlife Foundation that works for the protection of every animal and all of the vegetation in the territory. The entrance fee to the island contributes to financing the Foundations projects. Working our way south-west of the island we see the Tamarind Falls and the Le Morne Penisula, where people come from all over the world to kite surf.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: A journey to Brazil, to Fernando de Noronha, of which three-quarters is a protected Marine Park and was declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 2001. A paradise that is characterized by breathtaking landscapes with volcanic hills that plunge down into the incredible emerald green sea. Together with two authentic Brazilians, we explore the beaches, some of the most beautiful in the world, and where we are able to see, live, the hatching of baby turtles. But it is the dolphin " stenella longirostris" the true star of this trip to Brazil: the so-called rotating dolphin, a very friendly species that is able to perform rotating acrobatic leaps out of the water and that here on Fernando de Noronha, is the second largest community of these dolphins in the world.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Get your sun tan lotion on, because were headed to the land of perfect weather and sunsets. Well sample a fish taco, climb the 100s of steps of the California Tower, stand on the flight deck of the USS Midway, as well as, revisit San Diegos founding on the San Salvador at the San Diego Maritime museum.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Weve got our own private Idaho in Boise. Well tour one of the most stunning buildings in the frontier west at the Idaho State Capitol, dance all night with the Basques at the Basque museum and cultural center, soar to new heights at the Warhawk Air Museum in Nampa, and get a shiver down our spines at the Idaho state penitentiary.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Bill Ball breaks the rules and stereo types of travel shows as he ventures beyond the highlights. What do you do after youve lead groups to over 140 countries and all 7 continents? Welcome to Bills bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Launching payloads into space is a very difficult task, historically rocket launches are the proverbial "swords into ploughshares" Missiles designed to carry atomic warheads now send satellites and probes into the solar system. Ironically its one of the few exploits Mankind undertakes that doesnt occur in nature.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The International Space Station is undoubtedly the jewel in the crown of low Earth orbit; observation post, research lab and class room. Equally however there are many other assets orbiting Earth that are even more important to our everyday lives; delivering communications, weather observation, global positioning and resource management the list is growing with every year.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: The smallest country in Africa, The Gambia, rises from and follows the river of the same name, but most of all it is a country surrounded by Senegal. A country inhabited by a joyful people that we visit starting from the capital city Banjul, built on a small island, positioned between the sea and the river Gambia. With our cameras, we continue to explore traditional places: the miraculous waters of Kachikally park, crocodiles and cotton trees, the blooming Makasutu forest, between baboons and palm wine, and, last but not least, the colored fishing village of Tanje, with their dehydrated fish and magical views of the Atlantic Ocean.

programme.title: Distant Shores
programme.desc: Series 9 of Distant Shores follows Paul and Sheryl Shard on a diverse voyage from England through the inland waterways of France to the Mediterranean Sea, an Atlantic crossing, and island-hopping in the Caribbean aboard their 49-foot sailboat, Distant Shores II. When they travel through France to arrive in the Med they sail to Gibraltar. From Gibraltar they enter the Atlantic Ocean stopping at the exotic port of Rabat on the west coast of Morocco, then head offshore to explore the Canary Islands before joining the Atlantic Rally for Cruisers (ARC) in Las Palmas for a 2,800 mile trans-atlantic passage to the Caribbean for Christmas celebrations.

programme.title: Distant Shores
programme.desc: Series 9 of Distant Shores follows Paul and Sheryl Shard on a diverse voyage from England through the inland waterways of France to the Mediterranean Sea, an Atlantic crossing, and island-hopping in the Caribbean aboard their 49-foot sailboat, Distant Shores II. When they travel through France to arrive in the Med they sail to Gibraltar. From Gibraltar they enter the Atlantic Ocean stopping at the exotic port of Rabat on the west coast of Morocco, then head offshore to explore the Canary Islands before joining the Atlantic Rally for Cruisers (ARC) in Las Palmas for a 2,800 mile trans-atlantic passage to the Caribbean for Christmas celebrations.

programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: They orbit between us and our Star, the inner worlds; hidden within the suns glare often only visible at sunrise or sunset. Venus the first and brightest star in the evening sky, and Mercury fleeting across the solar disk. They are half of our solar systems terrestrial planets yet we know so little. As we begin to take a closer look at our companions they are posing more questions than answers.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: The Waiting is the hardest part. The anticipation of the next face shot, of an uncut heli run, and of an approaching storm is enough to drive this group of skiers to devote their entire lives to the pursuit of a sport and a lifestyle.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: European Islands
programme.desc: When Portuguese seafarers discovered the island of Madeira in 1419, it was completely uninhabited and covered with impenetrable forests. They rolled up their sleeves and got to work. They built canals called "levadas" to distribute water from the islands mountainous center all over the rest of the island. Over a thousand kilometers of them are now walkable, allowing you to get to wild, remote locations with waterfalls and incredible panoramas. Madeira is located in the path of the Gulf Stream, thanks to which it isnt just green, but blooming, all year round.

programme.title: Travel By Dart
programme.desc: This episode is probably the most random travel show you will ever see but - at the same time - one of the most complete when it comes to Uruguays traditions and customs. Sorin falls in love with this country, as it is one of the most developed nations in South America. A pleasant surprise is up for grabs. From learning about local wines to visiting the most extensive pencil collection in the Guinness Book of Records, Sorin gets to dive into the local dances and traditions - such as the Murga. Face painting and weird-looking behavior - here are some perfect ingredients for this episodes success. This is a must-see show, as the host takes you not only through Montevideo but the spectacular towns of Colonia and Punta del Este - the best-kept secrets of Uruguay. Click play.

programme.title: Most Intriguing Safari Destinations
programme.desc: Karina and Craig venture to the untamed Mana pools National park with Classic Africa Safaris in Zimbabwe. They camp in luxury safari tents on the bank of the mighty Zambezi river! This place, and the adventures that come with it, are absolutely amazing as Karina is nudged by a bull elephant and charged by a male lion! They canoe down the awesome Zambezi river, and finally get a chance to relax as they drink a sundowner in the fading light.

programme.title: Most Intriguing Safari Destinations
programme.desc: Karina visits the awesome Matobo Hills national park. She spends a few days at the magnificent Camp Amalinda, nestled within the caves with the most intriguing character and wonderful views. Karina enjoys Amalindas delectable signature dish. The very knowledgeable guide, Ian Harmer, leads her to one of the many cave painting spectacles. They go in search of the endangered white rhino and have a brush with near heart failure!

programme.title: Travel By Dart
programme.desc: Travel by Dart is a series that features countries that are not necessarily top tourist attractions. However, Sorin finds all the hidden gems that make a region stand out. It is the case of Cambodia, too, a country that became one of Sorins all-time favorites. This episode shows the host discovering the unseen beauty of the nation. The host takes part in an emotional Buddhist monk ceremony, then plants mangroves and immerses himself in the villagers lifestyle. A great visit to the famous Angkor Wat is a must, but his favorite part was a sunset expedition on Samsara, a water version of the Orient Express train. The episode is not complete without a few personal touches and stunts, so this is another must-see show. At the end of it, the dart throw ceremony brings up a huge surprise.

programme.title: European Islands
programme.desc: When Portuguese seafarers discovered the island of Madeira in 1419, it was completely uninhabited and covered with impenetrable forests. They rolled up their sleeves and got to work. They built canals called "levadas" to distribute water from the islands mountainous center all over the rest of the island. Over a thousand kilometers of them are now walkable, allowing you to get to wild, remote locations with waterfalls and incredible panoramas. Madeira is located in the path of the Gulf Stream, thanks to which it isnt just green, but blooming, all year round.

programme.title: European Islands
programme.desc: Tenerife is the largest and most diverse of the seven Canary Island. It is home to Spains highest mountain - Pico del Teide with an elevation of nearly 4OOO meters. Tenerife includes an incredible ten defined climate zones!!! There are substantial differences between the north and the south of the island. The northern, windward side receives three fourths of all precipitation, which is why it is green year round. The significant differences in elevation also contribute to the great contrasts, as do the mountain ranges extending through the middle of the island. You can experience large differences in temperature on Tenerife, especially in the winter months- you can swim and sunbathe on the southern beaches, while its freezing and snowing on the summit of Teide.

programme.title: Andalusia: The Moorish Architecture
programme.desc: Andalusia, the Spanish territory has a confluence of cultures which is represented in its architecture! Visigothic, Roman, Byzantine and Arab - the structures in the region display all these influences. Between 8th and 15th century, several dynasties from Arab to Berber conquered Andalusia impacting the way of life of people. The film tells this story through beautiful edifices of Andalusia.

programme.title: Japanese Heights
programme.desc: There is more to Japans natural landscape than just Mount Fuji! Discover the countrys numerous mountains and the ethos of the people who live there. From mountains with eight peaks, mountain gods who keep locals in their awe to building snow monsters and embracing modern activities like skiing - this documentary shows the unseen side to Japan!

programme.title: The Boy From the Wild
programme.desc: Growing up on a Game Reserve meant to help wildlife get out of captivity, it shares how it began and how Peter Meyer survived some incredible moments in the wild.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: Following the September 11 attacks, military presence became commonplace in New York and other American cities, and the counterterrorism forces were eﬀ ectively given a "blank cheque" when it came to ensuring that another terrorist incident would never take place on American soil. This episode of CQB takes an in-depth look at who was selected to occupy elite anti-terrorist positions, what they were trained for, and how they were equipped: when opposing forces are using commercial airliners and chemical weapons, countermeasures are by necessity complicated and varied. CQB takes an intimate look at what it was like to be an oﬃ cer on alert for chemical attacks in Washington DC, or an army reservist monitoring suspicious activities on the streets of NYC.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Ordsall Hall is over 820 years old. It has been put to many uses including a family home, working mens club and church hall. With over 15 hauntings and many sightings, Ordsall Hall will certainly keep the team busy.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: The Hack Green Secret Nuclear Bunker is a former government-owned nuclear bunker located at Hack Green, Cheshire, England. It Started as a decoy site for enemy bombers but later developed into a legitimate base. Now it is ripe with hauntings.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We set sail to the land of the Norseman in Oslo, Norway. Well climb the fort walls at Akershus Fortress and discover the North and South Poles at the Fram Museum. Then, well unearth ancient viking ship treasures at the Viking Ship Museum, and well brave the open waters of the Pacific with Thor Heyerdahl at the Kon-tiki museum.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: In this first of a two-parter on the Mara, we follow the migration in anticipation of the famous river crossings. We find all three big cats and hyena waiting for their chance to get their share of the migrants. During migration, the animal numbers are staggering.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: We elect to stay on a few extra days to try and obtain some good leopard footage. These are the most elusive of the "Big Twelve" and filming them is a major challenge. In the process of tracking leopards, we run across a newborn gazelle trying to walk for the first time. Will it succeed before the predators find it? Can we find and film a leopard up close?

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: An adventure in Croatia, to discover the Adriatic Sea but in apnoea. Together with Mike Maric, born in Rovigno dIstria and world record holder in apnoea, we explore the underwater sea beds, small very green islands and picturesque towns. But above all we visit the Brionian archipelago, and a National Park, of rare beauty, that in a very special way unites nature and different animal species and unexpected vegetables. Underwater, in apnoea, we swim over a field of Pinna nobilis or Noble Pen Shells, we enter underwater tunnels and caves with their magical light beams and finally we visit, at about 28 to 40 metres underwater the "Baron Gautch" a steam-boat that was shipwrecked in 1914, which is still quite well preserved.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: In Brazil we go to explore Porto de Galinhas, home to several of the most beautiful beaches along the North-eastern coast. In Maracaipe, where the waters of the river of the same name come together with water from the sea, creating an almost moon-like environment and where, the Hippocampus project, studies the life of sea-horses. For the second part we visit the fourth largest city in Brazil, Recife that has inherited an architectonic patrimony so beautiful that it is called "The Brazilian Venice". Then we continue to Olinda, declared in 1982 UNESCO World Heritage Site, and is one of the most well conserved colonial cities in all of Brazil, and which holds one of the most fascinating carnivals in the world. Here we meet the painter Sergio Vilanova who shows us his paintings and also his friend Silvio Bothelo work-shops where he makes the typical papier-mâche figures for the carnival.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Bonjour! Were headed to Quebec Province on todays show. First, we get blown away by the thunderous pipes at Montreals Notre Dame Basilica. After that, we go underneath the city at the Pointe a Calliere archaeology museum. Next, well learn about the native ecosystem at the gigantic, indoor, BioDome. Lastly, well learn about the 1967 Montreal Expo at the structures that are still visited today.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Travel Thru History is an Emmy-nominated, un-hosted lifestyle/travel series designed to spark interest and enthusiasm in viewers about our worlds rich and fascinating history by traveling to diverse locales across the globe. Locations include New Orleans, Las Vegas, Oslo, Belize, Dublin and more. In this episode we visit the Kennedy Space Center located on Floridas famous "Space Coast." Well speak to NASA engineers about the past, present and future of American space travel, as well as take a look at the attractions KSC has to offer.

It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Bill Ball breaks the rules and stereo types of travel shows as he ventures beyond the highlights. What do you do after youve lead groups to over 140 countries and all 7 continents? Welcome to Bills bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The International Space Station is undoubtedly the jewel in the crown of low Earth orbit; observation post, research lab and class room. Equally however there are many other assets orbiting Earth that are even more important to our everyday lives; delivering communications, weather observation, global positioning and resource management the list is growing with every year.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Our seafaring nature has translated well to the space age, seeking to sail out into the unknown in search of riches of one kind or another. While Europe and Asia continue their interest in the resource rich Moon, The United States and NASA have set their sights on nothing less than manned missions to Mars. Can they manage to go shore to shore on the most dangerous of unknown seas, deep space.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: Adventures in Tanzania. On board of a little Cessna plane, we reach the Songo Songo archipelago, 50 km south from Mafia. Its from here that, after 30 minutes of navigation, we arrive in our final destination: Fan Jove, an island in the middle of nowhere, once inhabited by sea nomads and today the realm of an eco-lodge. Surrounded by a 11km reef rich in fishes, birds and a lighthouse built by the Germans in 1894, Fan Jove is a real paradise in the middle of the Indian Ocean, that Malcolm Italian biologist who loves Africa, wants to show us in every magical detail.

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Its been sweetening America for almost 40 years! Now, find out the truth behind how SWEET N LOW actually got its name! And why do we yell SHOTGUN when getting into a car with friends? Then, is it really bad luck to open an umbrella in the house? And, learn the salty truth on how the POTATO CHIP was invented out of ANGER!

programme.title: Distant Shores
programme.desc: Series 9 of Distant Shores follows Paul and Sheryl Shard on a diverse voyage from England through the inland waterways of France to the Mediterranean Sea, an Atlantic crossing, and island-hopping in the Caribbean aboard their 49-foot sailboat, Distant Shores II. When they travel through France to arrive in the Med they sail to Gibraltar. From Gibraltar they enter the Atlantic Ocean stopping at the exotic port of Rabat on the west coast of Morocco, then head offshore to explore the Canary Islands before joining the Atlantic Rally for Cruisers (ARC) in Las Palmas for a 2,800 mile trans-atlantic passage to the Caribbean for Christmas celebrations.

programme.title: Diamond River Hunters
programme.desc: Peter gathers his team of miners and investors together for a pre-expedition briefing in Durban, South Africa. After a two day journey they reach the mountain kingdom of Lesotho. They arrive at the valley where they will be based, but only after a long and treacherous drive, towing the machinery down dangerous dirt roads. Finding a route to the river so they can setup equipment and mine is not easy. There are problems with the pumps and classifiers, and taking them off the trailers is a quick fix, but this compromises the mobility and safety of the operation. The equipment supplier has not taken the altitude into consideration, and the machinery will not work at full capacity. The team is concerned by Warrens recklessness as he almost rolls the TLB, while prepping the road to a new mining site. There is a snowfall, but work continues. Don is concerned that the river will flood with the snowmelt, and after they wrap for the day, the water levels rise and the machines are under threat. After a mad, dangerous scramble in the dark the equipment is saved, but it has been a close call. All the equipment was almost lost before they even had a chance to mine properly. After a few days of working at the initial site, the first bags are filled with concentrate but no diamonds are found. The team is upbeat and very excited to get set up at the hotspot in the next valley. The hard work of building roads and river crossings begins.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: It has fired our imaginations for millennia, Mars, the God of War and the source of Mans science fictional demise. We know the dry barren planet was once flowing with vast reservoirs of water, the sky thick and filled with clouds and the tantalizing possibility of life. It is the only other place in our solar system than Man might one day call home.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We visit Canadas capital city on a hill in Ottawa, Ontario. Well sail down the famous Rideau Canal locks. We go deep into Ottawas cold war history at the Diefenbunker, as well as, explore Canadas military history at the Canadian War Museum. Then we head up the Peace Tower and take a look at the library of Parliament. Finally, we learn about Canadas first nations tribes at the Canadian History Museum.

programme.title: Paris - Berlin: Shapes and Shades of History
programme.desc: Paris and Berlin have developed and grown facing each other over four centuries of tumultuous historical relationships and mutual admiration. The architecture and urbanism bear witness of this complex and rich confrontation.

programme.title: Hidden Traces
programme.desc: This documentary series uses cutting edge technology to shed new light on historical conflicts and the characters who lived through them with each episode dealing with a specific event or period in history. The viewer learns what daily life was really like for the common footsoldier during WWI as archeaologists bring their stories to life. An analysis of Napoleons strategy and the impact of the weather reveal why he was defeated by Wellington at Waterloo. Traces of the remains of Hitlers destroyed retreat on the Obersalzberg uncover the extent of the vast structural complex where he spent time with his mistress, Eva Braun. And, many years after the conflict in Vietnam, secret tunnels and unexploded bombs can still be found.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: The Bosnian War was an extraordinarily complex event, with many layers of military involvement including NATO forces, national militaries, irregular paramilitary forces, mujahedeen revolutionaries, private security companies, and international intelligence personnel. One tactic in particular struck fear into the hearts of the military and civilians alike: the use of snipers positioned in high buildings. This edition of CQB investigates this speciﬁ c combat technique and how it was countered by opposing forces. Taking viewers inside a "snipers den," the program explains how this tactic was so successfully used by rebel forces-and how traditional military techniques evolved to combat it.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: The practice of hiring private armies goes back to ancient times, and the mystique associated with the mercenary warrior has been the subject of many historical studies and ﬁ ctional characterizations. This episode of CQB takes a more contemporary look at a day in the life of a group of civilian contractors, and how their role has evolved on the modern battleﬁ eld. Using its "sub-second" analysis techniques and intimate ﬁrst-person footage, CQB reveals the backgrounds, training and equipment of todays "soldiers for hire" and how private armies are re-shaping the way conﬂ icts are conducted around the world.

programme.title: WWII Documentary Films
programme.desc: Award-winning documentary films produced to enlighten future generations about the personal stories of the WWII generations.

programme.title: Saving Auschwitz?
programme.desc: 70 years after Auschwitz Museum was founded as the memorial site of the Shoah, this site is subject to diversions, confrontations and plundering. Several attempts to exploit and rewrite its history are at work. The danger of desensitization through mass tourism, or the attempts of the local town and its citizens to simply erase the nightmare to make place for new urban landscape are real threats affecting the future of this memorial site. Today, as the last survivors are passing on, what to do with the Auschwitz site?

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: No country other than France operates an elite military force that invites foreign nationals to serve in its ranks. With a reputation for being a safe haven for individuals with questionable pasts, the French Foreign Legion is a true mercenary army that has garnered signiﬁ cant respect within the global special operations community. This episode of CQB examines a raid by the Foreign Legion on a small airport in Iraq during the 1990 Gulf War, exploring the nature of the Legion, how it diﬀ ers from other special forces, and how it prepares for a wide variety of close quarter battle scenarios in conﬂict situations around the world.

programme.title: Helter Skelter: Amerikāņu mīts
programme.desc: Tikko no cietuma izlaistais, "Helter Skelter" seko topošajam mūziķim Mensonam un viņa jaunajai "ģimenei" Losandželosā. Tajā viņš satiekas ar rokenrola karalisko aprindu pārstāvjiem un gandrīz noslēdz ierakstu līgumu.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Jaunai sievietei ir nāvējoša priekšnojauta. Ņūorleānas slepkavību izmeklēšanas komanda uzzina, ka viņas slepkava, iespējams, ir nogalinājis jau iepriekš.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Kad strīds bārā Talsā beidzas ar jauna sociālā aktīvista nošaušanu, policija meklē atbildes sašķeltā kopienā.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Ņūorleānas policija pie savas mājas nošauj gados vecāku vīrieti. Atlantas policija strādā, lai identificētu jauno vīrieti un sievieti, kas veikala kamerā tika piefiksēti, pastrādājot slepkavību gaišā dienas laikā.

programme.title: Noslepkavots no rīta
programme.desc: Pēc nakts maiņas Indiānas koledžas students dodas mājās. Pēc dažām stundām viņas automašīna tiek atrasta pamesta. Drīz tiek izdarīti divi šausminoši atklājumi, un izmeklētāji prāto - vai tik viņiem nav darīšana ar mazpilsētas sērijveida slepkavu.

programme.title: Noslepkavots no rīta
programme.desc: Vakars Misisipi kazino pārvēršas par murgu - tiek nolaupīta skaista sieva un māte. Izmeklētāji atklāj dažas pārsteidzošas patiesības, un aizdomās turamie ir ārkārtīgi daudz. Notiek kāds šokējošs pavērsiens, kas beidzot noved pie aresta.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Kāda vīrieša slepkavība ārpus mājas Memfisas piepilsētā noved izmeklētājus līdz ziņām par ārlaulības sakariem, sievas slepeno dzīvi, apdrošināšanas polisi un brāli, kurš ir gatavs darīt jebko savas māsas labā.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Kad savās mājās tiek atklāta noslepkavota ģimene, policija sāk medības trīs štatos, cenšoties atrast aukstasinīgos slepkavas.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Iebrukums mājās aizsāk masīvas medības pa vientuļo, sniegoto Aidaho tuksnesi, kur tiek meklēti divi bankas aplaupītāji. Viņi savulaik palīdzēja notvert bēdīgi slaveno padomju spiegu.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Izmisusi sieva zvana uz 911 - viņa ziņo par laupīšanu pēc tam, kad sašautu gultā atradusi savu vīru, trīs bērnu tēvu. Pierādījumi notikuma vietā ātri noved izmeklētājus pie slepkavas.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Brutāla un publiska jauna vidusskolnieka saduršana šokē sabiedrību. Policija ātri atklāj noziegumu un motīvu, izmantojot draudīgas balss ziņas un ilgi gruzdošu sāncensību.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: īstais CSI
programme.desc: Policija reaģē uz 999 izsaukumu, Koventrijā ir sadurts pusaudzis.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: īstais CSI
programme.desc: Daži draugi ir kopā, baudot dažus dzērienus, bet viens no viņiem tiek nogalināts, aizdomās turamais ātri arestēts.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: īstais CSI
programme.desc: Dudlijas policija izmeklē jauna vīrieša nāvi, kur, šķiet, tika izmantots liels ierocis, piemēram, mačete.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Džons E. Robinsons bija maldu meistars, kurš dzīvoja slepenu dzīvi. Viņš bija krāpnieks, kurš sevi sauca par "vergu kungu". Nevienam dzīvē nebija ne jausmas, cik nežēlīgi bija viņa noziegumi, vai cik tālu viņš ies, lai tos slēptu.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Kad Lū Pērlmans - vīrietis aiz The Backstreet Boys un NSYNC - aizbēga no valsts, tiesībsargi uzsāka starptautiskas medības. Vanity Fair īpašais korespondents Braiens Bero atklāj tumšos noslēpumus, no kuriem Lū bēg.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Talsas detektīvi cenšas saprast, kam uzticēties, kad vīrieti nošauj un notriec automašīna. Atlantā kāds bruņots vīrietis atklāj uguni pie naktskluba.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Kanzasas Sitija. Kad vīrietis tiek nošauts, aizstāvot savu sievu, Sitijas policijas detektīvi cer, ka viņa bijusī sieva varēs atklāt, kas, iespējams, vēlējās viņu nogalināt.

programme.title: Noslepkavots no rīta
programme.desc: Kad svētki sāk aprimt, raksturi pierimst un kāds pazūd. Dažas dienas vēlāk kādas Ziemeļkalifornijas pilsētas nolaistā daļā tiek uziets ķermenis. Kad lietas virzība apstājas, būs vajadzīgs ļoti negaidīts notikums, lai beidzot notvertu slepkavu.

programme.title: Noslepkavots no rīta
programme.desc: Mīklainos apstākļos izceļas ugunsgrēks dzīvoklī, un izmeklētāji pārbauda gruvešus, lai atklātu notikumus, kas noveda pie šīs katastrofas. Atkājas, ka tā nebija nejaušība, un sākas darbs, lai slepkavu iesēdinātu aiz restēm.

programme.title: Noslepkavots no rīta
programme.desc: Sandjego Action Sports konvencija kļūst nāvējoša. Pēc nakts ballītēm Gaslamp rajonā pazudis praktikants mārketingā. Pierādījumu gūzma ved izmeklētājus pie šokējoša atklājuma.

programme.title: Nāvīgās attiecības ar Feitu Dženkinu
programme.desc: Veiksmīgas uzņēmējas un mātes Makevas Dženkinsas nāve izraisa intensīvu izmeklēšanu, taču, lai atklātu maskās tērpto uzbrucēju, būs jāatmasko aizdomās turamo plejāde, tā atmaskojot šīs slepkavas attiecības.

programme.title: Nāvīgās attiecības ar Feitu Dženkinu
programme.desc: Homoseksuāla ogļrača Breda Makgerija nošaušana Bellērā, Ohaio štatā, izmeklētājiem rada aizdomas par naida noziegumu, taču, kad atklājas šokējošs noslēpums, tas atklāj negaidītu slepkavības motīvu.

programme.title: Helter Skelter: Amerikāņu mīts
programme.desc: Pēc 50 gadiem Čārlza Mensona stāsts ir kļuvis par leģendu, bet - kas ir fakts un kas izdomājums? Aizmirstiet visu dzirdēto, jo "Helter Skelter" ienirs vēl neizstāstītā stāstā par 20. gadsimta sensacionālāko slepkavību sēriju.

programme.title: Helter Skelter: Amerikāņu mīts
programme.desc: Helter Skelter bija visas nepieciešamās sastāvdaļas. Kā apstākļu vētra salauza jaunu zēnu un palīdzēja radīt vienu no visu laiku noslēpumainākajiem noziedzniekiem?

programme.title: Helter Skelter: Amerikāņu mīts
programme.desc: Tikko no cietuma izlaistais, "Helter Skelter" seko topošajam mūziķim Mensonam un viņa jaunajai "ģimenei" Losandželosā. Tajā viņš satiekas ar rokenrola karalisko aprindu pārstāvjiem un gandrīz noslēdz ierakstu līgumu.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: īstais CSI
programme.desc: Sieviete ar mācīšanās grūtībām apsūdz strādnieku par nepiedienīgu izrādīšanos viņas dzīvoklī.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: īstais CSI
programme.desc: Kādam cilvēkam uzbrukts un pēc šī uzbrukuma upuris ir komā. Policija mēģina izmantot DNS, lai apkopotu notikušo.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Filam Spektoram, dēvētam par "trako ģēniju" rokenrolā, bija tieksme pēc ieročiem. Kad policija tiek izsaukta uz viņa savrupmāju, viņi tur atrod sievietes līķi un mūzikas leģendu, kas, šķiet, ir kļuvusi nekontrolējama. Kurš izšāva ieroci? Un kāpēc?

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Vairāk nekā 500 vīriešu snieguši liecības, ka, apmeklējot Floridas reformu skolu, viņi cietuši no fiziskas un seksuālas vardarbības. Citi stāsta, ka universitātes pilsētiņā studenti nogalināti. Izmeklētāji atklāj satraucošus faktus un neiedomājamas patiesības.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Divus vīriešus notiesā par desmit gadus vecās Žanīnas Nikariko nolaupīšanu un nogalināšanu, piespriežot nāvessodu. Abi vīrieši uzstāj uz savu nevainību, un cīnās, lai noskaidrotu īsto slepkavu pirms nāvessoda izpildes datuma.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Talsas detektīvi cenšas saprast, kam uzticēties, kad vīrieti nošauj un notriec automašīna. Atlantā kāds bruņots vīrietis atklāj uguni pie naktskluba.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Kanzasas Sitija. Kad vīrietis tiek nošauts, aizstāvot savu sievu, Sitijas policijas detektīvi cer, ka viņa bijusī sieva varēs atklāt, kas, iespējams, vēlējās viņu nogalināt.

programme.title: Noslepkavots no rīta
programme.desc: Kad svētki sāk aprimt, raksturi pierimst un kāds pazūd. Dažas dienas vēlāk kādas Ziemeļkalifornijas pilsētas nolaistā daļā tiek uziets ķermenis. Kad lietas virzība apstājas, būs vajadzīgs ļoti negaidīts notikums, lai beidzot notvertu slepkavu.

programme.title: Noslepkavots no rīta
programme.desc: Mīklainos apstākļos izceļas ugunsgrēks dzīvoklī, un izmeklētāji pārbauda gruvešus, lai atklātu notikumus, kas noveda pie šīs katastrofas. Atkājas, ka tā nebija nejaušība, un sākas darbs, lai slepkavu iesēdinātu aiz restēm.

programme.title: Noslepkavots no rīta
programme.desc: Sandjego Action Sports konvencija kļūst nāvējoša. Pēc nakts ballītēm Gaslamp rajonā pazudis praktikants mārketingā. Pierādījumu gūzma ved izmeklētājus pie šokējoša atklājuma.

programme.title: Nāvīgās attiecības ar Feitu Dženkinu
programme.desc: Veiksmīgas uzņēmējas un mātes Makevas Dženkinsas nāve izraisa intensīvu izmeklēšanu, taču, lai atklātu maskās tērpto uzbrucēju, būs jāatmasko aizdomās turamo plejāde, tā atmaskojot šīs slepkavas attiecības.

programme.title: Nāvīgās attiecības ar Feitu Dženkinu
programme.desc: Homoseksuāla ogļrača Breda Makgerija nošaušana Bellērā, Ohaio štatā, izmeklētājiem rada aizdomas par naida noziegumu, taču, kad atklājas šokējošs noslēpums, tas atklāj negaidītu slepkavības motīvu.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Sema spriež vai viņa var pāriet darbā no sava vecā "es", vienlaikus mēģinot orientēties attiecībās ar "normālo". Kerola ielūkojas Semas istabā un izdara šausmīgu atklājumu. Džoels un Džeimss kopīgi pavada vakaru.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Sema uzzina, ka Kerola ir pārkāpusi viņas privātumu, abas sāk sprādzienbīstamu cīņu, liekot Bobam mēģināt būt par starpnieku. Kamēr ar Pīteru viss iet labi, Felīcija saņem nevēlamu ciemiņu no viņas pagātnes.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Sema sāk savu pirmo šausminoši personīgo saikni kā prātīgs cilvēks ar Felīcijas palīdzību, kurai ir lieli plāni, lai sāktu Semas iepazīšanās dzīvi. Kerola "nejauši" iestāda nelielu šaubu sēklu Britas prātā par Džoelu.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Sema ar maz ticamu sabiedroto gūst uzvaru, nonākot darba intervijā Ņujorkā, lai tikai atklātu, cik biedējoši ir rakstīt skaidrā; noraizējusies, ka viņas meitai vajadzīga palīdzība, Kerola pārkāpj robežu un iepazīstina ar Olīviju.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Sems un Džeimss dodas uz Ņujorku. Atrodoties tur, Sema saskaras ar atmiņām par to, kas viņa bija pirms atturības, un viņai jāizlemj, vai viņa var atkal riskēt kļūt par veco Semu. Olīvija un Stefānija sper svarīgu soli savā IVF ceļojumā.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Šajā atmiņu epizodē iereibis Džeimss Pateicības dienā bārā satiek piedzērušos "Katrīnu". Pēc izraidīšanas viņi abi sāk savas vienas nakts svētku svinības. Džeimsa laiks kopā ar Semu mudina viņu veikt izmaiņas.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Pēc pagrieziena punkta svinēšanas Sema nolemj, ka ir pienācis laiks izlīgt ar Kerolu. Kad cīņa ar Džoelu liek Britai pārdomāt nākotni, viņa pievēršas maz ticamam sabiedrotajam: Felīcijai. Tikmēr Džeimss slēpj destruktīvu noslēpumu.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Fils un Klēra atceļ Ziemassvētkus saviem bērniem - viņiem jāatzīstas mājās pieļautajos pārkāpumos. Džejs vilcinās atzīt Glorijas un Menija svētku tradīcijas. Mičels un Kamerons aizved Liliju satikt Ziemassvētku vecīti.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Menija tētis ieradies ar ekstravagantām dāvanām. Mičels un Kamerons cīnās par to, kā parūpēties par savu meitu viņas nakts raudāšanas laikā. Klēra mēģina pārsteigt ugunsdzēsējus, kuri reaģēja uz Fila izsaukumu.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Glorija plāno atbrīvoties no Džeja jaunā "suņa sulaiņa". Kamerona izpalīdzīgā daba liek iekulties nepatikšanās ar Mičelu. Klēra lūdz Filu sodīt viņu dēlu par kailu cilvēku vērošanu, nezinot, ka tie ir Filam.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Mičels stāsta Džejam, ka viens no viņa draugiem ir gejs. Klēra kļūst neapmierināta ar Fila jauno tālvadības pulti. Glorija pārplāno Menija "randiņu", lai uzlabotu savu pašcieņu.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Klēra jūtas kā neveiksminiece, kad sastopas ar senu draugu no darba. Džejam un Kameronam ir nepatīkama "satikšanās" ģērbtuvē. Mičels mēģina sniegt juridisku padomu Glorijai.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Marija nevēlas, lai Roberts paliktu viens, tāpēc viņa uz Ameriku uzaicina Stefāniju. Taču - viņa atbrauc kopā ar savu tēvu.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Kad Rejs iegādājas jaunu, augstākās klases putekļsūcēju, Debra nolemj to aizvest uz Marijas mājām, meklējot netīrumus.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Marija domā, ka Debrai ir viņas lādīte, bet Debra saka, ka viņai tās nav. Kad Debra to atrod Alijas istabā, viņa lūdz Reju un Robertu palīdzēt viņai to slepus ienest atpakaļ Marijas mājā.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejs iegulda naudu kartingu projektā, nepasakot par to Debrai. Viņš saka, ka tā ir viņa nauda. Rezultātā Debra izraksta viņam rēķinu par darbu, ko viņa veic ar bērniem un māju. Roberts to salīdzina ar tiesas prāvu par nāvi nelikumīgā kārtā - dzīvības vērtība.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Marijai šķiet, ka ar Robertu kaut kas nav kārtībā. Tāpēc viņa sapulcina visas meitenes Roberta dzīvē, lai izdomātu veidus, kā viņam palīdzēt.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Filisa stāvvietā sastopas ar virinātāju, un Dvaits steidz pastiprināt drošību. Maikls nolemj ofisa meitenes aizvest uz veiklau, bet patiesībā viņš to dara, lai iegūtu padomu par šķiršanos no Dženas.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls izmanto "pludmales dienu" Dunder Mifflin, lai uzzinātu, kurš darbinieks būtu labākais viņa aizstājējs - vien gadījumā, ja viņš saņemtu paaugstinājumu un dotos uz Ņujorku.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls norīko Dvaitu par reģionālo menedžeri, uzskatot, ka viņš iegūs darbu uzņēmuma vadībā. Džims un Kārena arī tiek intervēti uz šo pašu amatu. Maikls atgriežas pie Dženas, kad viņa palielina krūtis.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls norīko Dvaitu par reģionālo menedžeri, uzskatot, ka viņš iegūs darbu uzņēmuma vadībā. Džims un Kārena arī tiek intervēti uz šo pašu amatu. Maikls atgriežas pie Dženas, kad viņa palielina krūtis.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls stāvvietā nejauši uzbrauc virsū Mereditai, un viņa vainas apziņa liek organizēt viņai veltītu 5K skrējienu. Dvaits un Andžela sastrīdas, jo viņš nogalinājis viņas kaķi, un tiek atklātas Džima un Pemas attiecības.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Apzinoties, ka Dženna varētu izšķirt prezidenta vēlēšanas, Liza un Džeks sarīko debates, lai iegūtu viņas atbalstu un sekotājus. Kenets vēršas pie Treisija pēc padoma, kā būt informētam vēlētājam, savukārt Pīts mēģina atjaunot 2008. gada vēlēšanu burvību.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Džeks uzzina, ka ļaundaris Treisija jaunajā filmā ir viņa prototips. Liza ļauj Heizelai kļūt par viņas asistenti pēc operācijas, un Dženna cenšas būt atbalstoša un ieklausīties Kenetā.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liza un Krisa vienojas precēties, bet Liza nevēlas rīkot parastās kāzas. Tikmēr Treisijs samierinās ar faktu, ka viņš kļūs vecs, bet Dženna atklāj savu patieso naudas vērtību.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Džeka mamma agri ieradusies brīvdienās. Dženna mēģina uzmundrināt Lizu ar savām pārsteiguma kāzām, un Treisijs ar Florences Hendersones palīdzību cenšas piepildīt Keneta vēlmi, lai viņa dzīve būtu vairāk līdzīga TV.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Džeks ar Devona Benksa palīdzību plāno pārņemt Kebltaunas izpilddirektora amatu. Liza saņem sliktas ziņas no adopcijas aģentūras, un galvenā aktrise Treisija Harietas Tubmenas biogrāfiskajā filmā izrādās paša Treisija sievietes versija.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Ņujorkas pievārtē kādā senlaicīgā un baisā Steitenailendas mājā mitinās iedzīvotāji, kuru dzīve lielākoties sākas iestājoties tumsai. Nama stāvus apdzīvo trīs asinsūcēji vampīri – Nandors, Lazlo un Nadja –, enerģijas vampīrs Kolins Robinsons, kurš strādā birojā un ar savu nomācošo klātbūtni izsūc enerģiju saviem kolēģiem, un Giljermo, Nadīnas paziņa. Kā jau kārtīgi vampīri, viņi ir vairākus gadsimtus seni, un iekļaušanās mūsdienu pasaulē tiem nereti sagādā galvassāpes. Otrajā sezonā vampīriem būs jāsaskaras ar zombijiem, raganām, spokiem, slepkavām, interneta troļļiem un citiem mošķiem. Tikmēr Giljermo būs jāizšķiras, vai pašam kļūt par vampīru.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Ieskats trīs vampīru ikdienas (vai drīzāk – iknakts) dzīvē Steitenailendā, kur viņi kopā pavadījuši nu jau vairāk nekā 100 gadus.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Kāzu dienā Britas nervozitāte liek viņai pieņemt negaidītu lēmumu. Kerola un Bobs paceļ savas attiecības jaunā līmenī. Sema uzzina patiesību par Džeimsu un ir satricināta par to, kāda varētu būt viņas nākotne.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Sema spriež vai viņa var pāriet darbā no sava vecā "es", vienlaikus mēģinot orientēties attiecībās ar "normālo". Kerola ielūkojas Semas istabā un izdara šausmīgu atklājumu. Džoels un Džeimss kopīgi pavada vakaru.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Semas jaunatklātā pašapziņa tiek satricināta - viņa uzzina, ka viņas jaunais priekšnieks ir pagātnes rēgs. Tikmēr Felīcija kļūdās, apsveicot savu draugu ar viņa paaugstināšanu amatā. Un Olīvija pieņem dzīvi mainošu lēmumu.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Sema spriež vai viņa var pāriet darbā no sava vecā "es", vienlaikus mēģinot orientēties attiecībās ar "normālo". Kerola ielūkojas Semas istabā un izdara šausmīgu atklājumu. Džoels un Džeimss kopīgi pavada vakaru.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Sema uzzina, ka Kerola ir pārkāpusi viņas privātumu, abas sāk sprādzienbīstamu cīņu, liekot Bobam mēģināt būt par starpnieku. Kamēr ar Pīteru viss iet labi, Felīcija saņem nevēlamu ciemiņu no viņas pagātnes.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Džejs aizved Gloriju pie Deivida Brennera. Mičels un Kamerons cenšas pierunāt Meniju uz randiņu. Fils un Klēra cenšas paspilgtināt lietas, dodoties romantiskā atpūtā.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Trešajā mēģinājumā nokārtot auto eksāmenu Heilija saskaras ar biedējošu braukšanas eksaminētāju. Aleksu satrauc skolas dejas. Glorija apsmej Džeju un Meniju, lai viņi izbrauktu ar amerikāņu kalniņiem. Fils un Lūks zem mājas meklē dārgumus.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Džejs nejauši nogalina Menija bruņurupuci un melo par to. Klēra kļūst greizsirdīga - Fila bijusī draudzene ieradusies ciemos. Mičels pieņem drosmīgu lēmumu. Viņš nokavējis ģimenes dienu, jo viņam bija jābūt darbā.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Džejs un Mičels mēģina izveidot attiecības, vērojot meteoru lietu, taču nekas nenotiek saskaņā ar plānu. Glorija un Kamerons cenšas atrast kaut ko citu, lai pavadītu kopīgi laiku. Klēra un Fils cenšas palīdzēt saviem bērniem viņu skolas projektos.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Džejs izaicina Gloriju un Meniju uz izcilu šaha spēli. Klēra dara visu, lai atrastu jaunu gadžetu Fila dzimšanas dienas dāvanai, bet Kamerons bāž degunu kaimiņu lietās.

programme.title: Bruklina

programme.desc: Rejs domā, ka viņa bērniem Roberts patīk labāk nekā viņš pats.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Debrai ir grūti tikt galā ar vecāku šķiršanos.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Frenks, Rejs un Roberts krāso Reja māju. Roberts un Rejs uzzina ko jaunu par savu tēvu.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Atskats uz laiku, kad dzima Alija.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Debra ilgojas pēc mierīgas un klusas dzimšanas dienas mājās, kopā ar Reimondu. Viņš stāsta saviem vecākiem un brālim, ka nekādas ballītes nebūs.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
