programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls stāvvietā nejauši uzbrauc virsū Mereditai, un viņa vainas apziņa liek organizēt viņai veltītu 5K skrējienu. Dvaits un Andžela sastrīdas, jo viņš nogalinājis viņas kaķi, un tiek atklātas Džima un Pemas attiecības.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls jūtas apdraudēts, jo Raiens atgriezies Skrentonas birojā, lai dalītos savās idejās par Dunder Mifflin nākotni. Džima un Pemas attiecības nonāk atklātībā pa visu biroju, savukārt Andželas un Dvaita attiecības ir iesprūdušas.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls jūtas apdraudēts, jo Raiens atgriezies Skrentonas birojā, lai dalītos savās idejās par Dunder Mifflin nākotni. Džima un Pemas attiecības nonāk atklātībā pa visu biroju, savukārt Andželas un Dvaita attiecības ir iesprūdušas.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Tiek atkļata Dunder Mifflin Infinity mājaslapa, un Maikls ir sajūsmā par došanos uz lielo atklāšanas ballīti Ņujorkā. Tikmēr Andžela plāno satelītballīti Skrentonas filiālē. Dvaits sacenšas ar mājaslapu, lai noskaidrotu, kurš vienas dienas laikā var pārdot visvairāk papīru.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Tiek atkļata Dunder Mifflin Infinity mājaslapa, un Maikls ir sajūsmā par došanos uz lielo atklāšanas ballīti Ņujorkā. Tikmēr Andžela plāno satelītballīti Skrentonas filiālē. Dvaits sacenšas ar mājaslapu, lai noskaidrotu, kurš vienas dienas laikā var pārdot visvairāk papīru.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Džeks un Liza dodas uz Floridu. Tur viņi uzzina šokējošu noslēpumu par Džeka mirušo māti, un Heizela iesūdz kanālu par seksuālu uzmākšanos.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Lizas adopcijas pieprasījums beidzot ir apstiprināts, taču viņa ir pārāk aizņemta, mēģinot vienatnē glābt TGS no bojāejas, un nepamana šo apstiprinājumu. Kenets cenšas palīdzēt Džekam, cenšoties izvēlēties savu pēcteci.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liza risina jautājumus ar māti, kas paliek mājās, kamēr Džeks cenšas atrast patiesu laimi. Gan Kenets, gan Treisijs pielāgojas Keneta jaunajam NBC prezidenta amatam.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Aktieri un komanda satiekas pēdējā TGS sērijā.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Nandora mīlas meklējumi beidzot rezultējas panākumiem, bet Nadja apjauš, ka viņas mūža lielākā ambīcija ir atvērt savu vampīru naktsklubu.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Nadjas naktskluba atklāšanas diena ir apdraudēta - savu uzstāšanos atcēlis kāds ievērojams mūziķis.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Vampīri devušies ceļojumā uz slepeno Nakts tirgu, kur uz tirgošanos un laika kopā pavadīšanu satiekas visas pārdabiskās būtnes.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Vampīri uzsākuši privātskolas interviju procesu.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Giljermo pazaudē prātu, cenšoties palīdzēt Nandorai izplānot perfektas vampīru kāzas.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Speids meklē atbildes par noslēpumainu jaunu zēnu, kuru šķietami meklē pilnīgi visi. Samīrs paslēpj zēnu, un neviens nezina, ko īsti domāt par viņa uzrakstīto.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Ir 1963. gads, un leģendārais detektīvs Sems Speids bauda pensijas gadus Francijas dienvidos, tomēr baumas par sena ienaidnieka atgriešanos izjauc šo idilli.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Atvaļināts arheologs, vikāra sieva un vietējais suņu staidzinātājs izveido neticamu draudzību, vienlaikus cīnoties ar laiku, lai apturētu sērijveida slepkavu savā pilsētā.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Ciema iedzīvotāji arvien vairāk sāk interesēties par ziņu vietējā avīzē, kur tiek paziņots par slepkavību tajā pašā vakarā. Vai tā ir slepkavības spēle?

programme.title: Hārdakri
programme.desc: Šis ir stāsts par strādnieku šķiras ģimenes Hārdakru dzīvi, mīlestību un ceļu uz bagātību 19. gs. beigu Jorkšīrā.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Kad tiek noslepkavots tuvs Potsa kunga draugs, Elīza sāk pētīt tumšo un drūmo Viktorijas laikmeta apbedītāju pasauli.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Džeims atgriežas mājas dzīvē, tomēr viņam joprojām jāatrod kontakts ar Džimiju. Hola kundze nonāk strīda starp Sigfrīdu un jauno priekšnieku krustugunīs.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc modeles Bārbijas Džounsas un modes dizaineres Florences Astores dubultslepkavībām Peregrīna izmanto savas nepārbaudītās un neparastās prasmes, lai mēģinātu notvert viņu slepkavu, pirms viņi atkal uzbrūk.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Ir 1940. gada pavasaris, un Skeldeilas namā visus gaida pārmaiņas. Džeimss un Helēna prāto, kad pienāks īstais brīdis ģimenes pieaugumam, nezinot, vai Džeimsu iesauks armijā vai ne. Tristana prombūtni sajūt visi, bet visskarbāk Zigfrīds, kurš cenšas uzturēt pieaugošo mājsaimniecību un braši turēties gaidāmo izaicinājumu priekšā. Uzplaukst Holas kundzes un Helēnas draudzība, abas lūkojas nākotnē. Un ierodas jauns veterinārijas students Ričards Kārmondijs, radot ķibeles mājā.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Ir 1940. gada pavasaris, un Skeldeilas namā visus gaida pārmaiņas. Džeimss un Helēna prāto, kad pienāks īstais brīdis ģimenes pieaugumam, nezinot, vai Džeimsu iesauks armijā vai ne. programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Ir 1940. gada pavasaris, un Skeldeilas namā visus gaida pārmaiņas. Džeimss un Helēna prāto, kad pienāks īstais brīdis ģimenes pieaugumam, nezinot, vai Džeimsu iesauks armijā vai ne. Tristana prombūtni sajūt visi, bet visskarbāk Zigfrīds, kurš cenšas uzturēt pieaugošo mājsaimniecību un braši turēties gaidāmo izaicinājumu priekšā. Uzplaukst Holas kundzes un Helēnas draudzība, abas lūkojas nākotnē. Un ierodas jauns veterinārijas students Ričards Kārmondijs, radot ķibeles mājā.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Hola kundze un Helēna dodas uz tikšanos Darovbijā par atbalstu kara dalībniekiem. Sigfrīdam jānodrošina, ka Tristana prombūtnē operācija turpinās. Viņš lūdz palīdzību Kārmodijam.

programme.title: Tesa no dErbervilu cilts
programme.desc: Pēc traumatiskas tikšanās ar manipulatīvo Aleksu nabadzīgā Tesa mēģina atjaunot līdzsvaru savā dzīvē un iemīlas ideālistā Endželā. Kad par sevi atgādina pagātne, šīs jūtas tiek atklātas.

programme.title: Džeina Eira
programme.desc: Bārene Džeina Eira kļūst par guvernanti Tornfīldholā. Pirmo reizi viņa jūtas kaut kur piederīga, tomēr kādā dienā viņu pamodina dīvainas skaņas.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Atvaļināts arheologs, vikāra sieva un vietējais suņu staidzinātājs izveido neticamu draudzību, vienlaikus cīnoties ar laiku, lai apturētu sērijveida slepkavu savā pilsētā.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Šī kriminālseriāla darbība sākās 1970. gadu Anglijā, un tas tiek stāstīts no enigmatiska detektīva P. D. Džeimsa skatpunkta un seko Dalglīša karjerai līdz mūsdienām.

programme.title: Komisārs Megrē
programme.desc: Šī ir jauna adaptācija Žorža Simeona stāstiem par iemīļoto franču detektīvu Žilu Megrē, kuru atveido pats Rovans Atkinsons.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Bijušais detektīvs Karls Albergs pārceļas uz nelielu piekrastes pilsētiņu, lai rastu mierinājumu un saskaras ar virkni slepkavību. Iedzīvotāja slepkavībā Albergs aizdomās tur citu vietējo iedzīvotāju.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mārplas jaunkundze uzskata, ka Krekentorpu īpašumā ir paslēpts līķis un izmeklē šo turīgo klanu pēc tam, kad kāds viņas draugs redz brutālu nožņaugšanu garāmbraucošā vilcienā.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Ciema iedzīvotāji arvien vairāk sāk interesēties par ziņu vietējā avīzē, kur tiek paziņots par slepkavību tajā pašā vakarā. Vai tā ir slepkavības spēle?

programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Ir Jaungada vakars, un uz kluba grīdas tiek atrasts populāras dziedātājas līķis. Mēs pagriežam laiku atpakaļ, un Peregrīne saprot, ka visu nakti ir vērojusi slepkavu, to neapzinoties.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi

programme.desc: Pēc modeles Bārbijas Džounsas un modes dizaineres Florences Astores dubultslepkavībām Peregrīna izmanto savas nepārbaudītās un neparastās prasmes, lai mēģinātu notvert viņu slepkavu, pirms viņi atkal uzbrūk.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mārplas jaunkundze uzskata, ka Krekentorpu īpašumā ir paslēpts līķis un izmeklē šo turīgo klanu pēc tam, kad kāds viņas draugs redz brutālu nožņaugšanu garāmbraucošā vilcienā.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Detektīvs Ficrojs pamana, ka kāds no kolēģiem izmanto nepatiesus pierādījumus, lai apsūdzētu kādu aizdomās turamo. Tā kā Hercogs ir devies projām, viņš nolīgst Elīzu, lai izmeklētu korupciju policijā.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīzai ir iespēja atrast milzīgu bagātību, kad viņa piedāvā palīdzību iespējamajam mantiniekam. Tomēr viņai būs jāiesaista arī Hercogs, lai gan jauni fakti padara šādu sadarbību neiespējamu.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīza pa pastu saņem spridzekli. Kas to nosūtījis un kāpēc? Elīza apvienojas ar Hercogu, Mozu un seno ienaidnieku Patriku Nešu, lai uzzinātu, kas sūtījis šo nāvējošo dāvanu.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīza ir pārņēmusi Londonas detektīvu aģentūru "Nešs un dēli"; tomēr ne viss izdodas. Viņas attiecībās ar Hercogu paliek skaidrs, ka jāpieņem lēmums, kas visu mainīs.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Atvaļināts arheologs, vikāra sieva un vietējais suņu staidzinātājs izveido neticamu draudzību, vienlaikus cīnoties ar laiku, lai apturētu sērijveida slepkavu savā pilsētā.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Pārsteidzoša saikne ar kādu pazuduša cilvēka lietu liek no jauna paskatīties uz vietējiem iedzīvotājiem, tomēr, vai kāds no viņiem tiešām varētu būt izdarījis slepkavību?

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Atvaļināts arheologs, vikāra sieva un vietējais suņu staidzinātājs izveido neticamu draudzību, vienlaikus cīnoties ar laiku, lai apturētu sērijveida slepkavu savā pilsētā.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Atvaļināts arheologs, vikāra sieva un vietējais suņu staidzinātājs izveido neticamu draudzību, vienlaikus cīnoties ar laiku, lai apturētu sērijveida slepkavu savā pilsētā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks un Krebtrijs piedalās kaujas rekonstrukcijā, kuras laikā tiek nogalināts viens no tās dalībniekiem.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mēdoks pārceļas uz pansiju, kur kāds dīvains īrnieks pieprasa, lai Mērdoks palīdz izmeklēt ēkā notikušu slepkavību.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad Krebtrijs un Efija ierodas uz Dikensa dzimšanas dienas svinībām, mājastēvs tiek atrasts miris.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad tiek nolaupīta Higinsa brāļa sieva, viņš tiek aizsūtīts ar izpirkuma naudu un pazūd. Mērdoks uzsāk vajāšanu.

programme.title: Tesa no dErbervilu cilts
programme.desc: Pēc traumatiskas tikšanās ar manipulatīvo Aleksu nabadzīgā Tesa mēģina atjaunot līdzsvaru savā dzīvē un iemīlas ideālistā Endželā. Kad par sevi atgādina pagātne, šīs jūtas tiek atklātas.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Šī kriminālseriāla darbība sākās 1970. gadu Anglijā, un tas tiek stāstīts no enigmatiska detektīva P. D. Džeimsa skatpunkta un seko Dalglīša karjerai līdz mūsdienām.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Speids meklē atbildes par noslēpumainu jaunu zēnu, kuru šķietami meklē pilnīgi visi. Samīrs paslēpj zēnu, un neviens nezina, ko īsti domāt par viņa uzrakstīto.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Ir 1963. gads, un leģendārais detektīvs Sems Speids bauda pensijas gadus Francijas dienvidos, tomēr baumas par sena ienaidnieka atgriešanos izjauc šo idilli.

programme.title: Hārdakri
programme.desc: Šis ir stāsts par strādnieku šķiras ģimenes Hārdakru dzīvi, mīlestību un ceļu uz bagātību 19. gs. beigu Jorkšīrā.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Šī kriminālseriāla darbība sākās 1970. gadu Anglijā, un tas tiek stāstīts no enigmatiska detektīva P. D. Džeimsa skatpunkta un seko Dalglīša karjerai līdz mūsdienām.

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Sisi un Rūdolfs bauda laiku uz salas. Francis baidās no Vācijas un Krievijas alianses un uzzina, kur atrodas sieva un dēls.

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Francis un Sisi apvienojas Francijas dienvidos. Tad Francis slepeni dodas uz Vīni kopā ar Rūdolfu. Sisi vairs nekas nav atlicis, bet Francis drīz sāk apšaubīt savu lēmumu.

programme.title: Hārdakri
programme.desc: Šis ir stāsts par strādnieku šķiras ģimenes Hārdakru dzīvi, mīlestību un ceļu uz bagātību 19. gs. beigu Jorkšīrā.

programme.title: The European Debrief
programme.desc: Live headlines,breaking news, analysis and interviews from Europes News Centre.

programme.title: Brussels, My Love?
programme.desc: This talk show sheds light on European affairs and the issues that impact on our daily lives as Europeans.

programme.title: Новенькая
programme.desc: В элитную школу для детей богатых родителей попадает Вера - девушка из обычной семьи. Она сразу оказывается в центре запутанной детективной интриги и школьных конфликтов, и, конечно же, романтической истории. Но все не так просто: у Веры также есть тайна, и в элитном заведении она оказалась случайно...

programme.title: People You May Know
programme.desc: People You May Know follows Jed, a 30-something introvert who has managed to abstain from social media until now. When prompted with the gargantuan task of defining who he is, he realizes the life he can fake is much more interesting than the life he actually leads.

programme.title: 4Got10
programme.desc: Brian Barnes (Johnny Messner) wakes up in the desert wounded and with no memory and no idea why hes surrounded by eight bodies, a van with four million in cash and a van full of cocaine. Brian is pursued by not only notorious drug lord Danny Perez (Danny Trejo) who desperately want his money back, and DEA Agent Rooker (Dolph Lundgren), but also a by the corrupt Sheriff Olson (Michael Pare) who will stop at nothing to get his hand on the new found fortune. On the run, Brian discovers the more he remembers the less he wants to know about who he really is.

programme.title: Get the Girl
programme.desc: Calvin Jones works at a boring and whimsical office job while searching for meaning to his life and decides that means winning the affections of the office hottie Britney. Calvin struggles mightily to capture the true words to express his feelings, but can not.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: Baba
programme.desc: An weird but witty old woman is forced to deal with an ambiguous future after her country, family and the entire system of values are ruined. She is trying to solve her existential problems catching d trying to sell a rewarded war criminal as he was a rabbit in a wood. The only thing she did not know if he is really him.

programme.title: Summer Dreams
programme.desc: Seventeen-year old Robbie Zirpollo has a problem. As the film opens, his mother is driving him to his new summer job. We learn that Robbie has grown up in Oceanside, California, but now he and his mother have moved to Colorado for a fresh start, as his father has taken the familys savings and his secretary to Mexico. Robbies mom has, through an uncle, gotten him a summer job at Water World on the grounds crew. The adventure begins when Robbie meets Alex and gets moved to Aokees Surf and Snack shack to work. Alex convinces Robbie to enter the parks "Employee Olympics" to bring the Surfer King trophy to its rightful place among the concessions crew. Tiffany, the park owners daughter, has other ideas for Robbie.

programme.title: The Phantom Father
programme.desc: The Phantom Father tells a story of an American professor Robert Traum, who takes a sabbatical from his teaching job to trace his roots in Romania. Traum soon discovers that he comes from a wealthy family involved in organized crime. He manages to reestablish contact with the sole remaining link to his otherwise deceased family—Sami. Rocco Castoro, the editor-in-chief of VICE magazine called the movie the best Romanian movie hes ever seen.

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
programme.desc: A mother falls for a younger man while her daughter falls in love for the first time. Mother Nature messes with their fates.

programme.title: The Magnificent Ambersons
programme.desc: The spoiled rotten and utterly unlikable rich kid George Amberson becomes horrified when his recently widowed mother rekindles her relationship with the wealthy Eugene Morgan, who she left decades earlier in order to marry Georges father. As George struggles to sabotage his mothers new romance, he must deal with his own romantic feelings for Morgans daughter and the consequences of his meddling as his once great family falls into ruin due to his machinations...

programme.title: Land Of the Blind
programme.desc: A soldier recounts his relationship with a famous political prisoner attempting to overthrow their countrys authoritarian government.

programme.title: Jail Caesar
programme.desc: Paul Schoolman, a filmmaker from South Africa chose to portray the early years in the life of Julius Caesar through a story told from three prisons (Pollsmoor, Cape Town, Cardiff in Wales, and Drumheller in Canada). While he hired such great actors as Derek Jacobi, he also engaged a cast of real inmates. The movie was screened at several film festivals including Moscow and Chicago.

programme.title: Blind Obsession
programme.desc: During a gun battle with a pair of criminal brothers, police officer Jack Fletcher (Brad Johnson) incurs a wound that leaves him temporarily sightless. During his recovery, Jack is helped by Rebecca (Megan Gallagher), who works as a "trainer" for the newly blind. Gradually, Jack and Rebecca fall in love, much to the dismay of Rebeccas overprotective sister, Bedelia (Roxana Zal), who as a childhood incest victim has developed a pathological hatred for all men. Thus, once his sight is restored, Jack finds himself in the crosshairs of two potential assassins -- the demented Bedelia, and the brother of the crook he killed.

programme.title: Crossing Point
programme.desc: The girlfriend of a couple vacationing in Baja is kidnapped by a drug dealer who demands that her boyfriend smuggle back cocaine into the US or she will be killed.

programme.title: Saving Lincoln
programme.desc: The true story of Abraham Lincoln and his bodyguard, U.S. Marshal Ward Hill Lamon. This unique film features sets created from actual Civil War photographs.

programme.title: Unknown Energies, Unidentified Emotions
programme.desc: A hybrid of animated, experimental, feature and genre film in found footage technique, with a radio phonic sound and of unexpected, almost 40-minute duration. Journalist Isidor Dukas visits the Institute for Research on Psychic Phenomena and Mental Film when a confrontation with one of the test subjects transforms a routine check into a never-ending maze. Barićs work calls into question issues surrounding artistic practices in the digital age including ideas about authenticity, simulation/replication and appropriation.

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: A railroad worker in China in 1941 leads a team of freedom fighters against the Japanese in order to get food for the poor.

programme.title: The Sandman
programme.desc: One fine morning, Benno finds sand in his bed. While he tries to ignore this at first, he soon must realize that he himself is loosing the sand. Day after day the sand increases and soon his time literally starts running short. Finally he is left no choice but to ask Sandra for help, who runs a small coffee shop under his apartment. Although Benno hates her with a passion, he started having dreams of her every night. What could Sandra and the dreams have to do with the sand?

programme.title: The Ambassador to Bern
programme.desc: Attila Szaszs political thriller portraying the events of the hostage taking of the Hungarian ambassador to Switzerland in the aftermath of the 1956 Hungarian Revolution. The film was presented at numerous festivals all over the world. It won the Frederico Fellini Award at Tiburon International Film Festival.

programme.title: See You in September
programme.desc: See You in September is an original romantic comedy set in current day Manhattan. The film centers around Lindsay, a beautiful woman who seemingly has it all, but is deeply afraid of commitment. When she finds out that her therapist takes a vacation for the entire month of August she feels shocked and abandoned. Instead of taking this news lying down, Lindsay enlists the help of her acerbic best friend Monica to come up with a solution. With the assistance of "Craigs List", Lindsay puts together a group therapy session for all Manhattanites who are in need of therapy, but more importantly angry at their therapists for abandoning them.

programme.title: Headwinds
programme.desc: Sarah tells Paul that she wants out of their marriage; the next day she disappears. A year later and Paul along with their children return to his childhood town to start anew after the loss of his wife and their mother.

programme.title: The Groomsmen
programme.desc: A groom (Ed Burns) and his four attendants wrestle with issues related to friendship and maturity a week before the big day.

programme.title: Hangman
programme.desc: A fisherman discovers an abandoned sailboat and decides to board. He finds no signs of life, but when he gets back on deck his own boat appears to have disappeared. What follows is an absolute nightmare.

programme.title: Spooner
programme.desc: Facing eviction from his parents home on his 30th birthday, a socially awkward guy meets the girl of his dreams and creates his own rules for growing up.

programme.title: When Do We Eat?
programme.desc: A familys Passover gets screwy after the patriarch unknowingly ingests a hit of Ecstasy.

programme.title: Musketeers Forever
programme.desc: A group of ex-secret agents opens a Jazz Club in Las Vegas. When they discover that a local Indian reservation is being threatened by a greedy and powerful gangster, they act. All for one, and one for all!

programme.title: Neiespējamais
programme.desc: Stāsts par tūristu ģimeni Taizemē, kas tur sagaidījuši 2004. gada Indijas okeāna cunami iznīcību un postu.

programme.title: Bez nožēlas
programme.desc: Elitārs jūras kājinieks dodas ceļā, lai atriebtu savas sievas slepkavību, nonākot aizvien lielākās sazvērestībās.

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Saulains velobrauciens cauri Lahemā.

programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.title: Sociālais tīkls
programme.desc: Kādā rudens naktī Harvardas students Marks Cukerbergs, kas ir datorprogrammēšanas ģēnijs, pārdzīvo šķiršanos no savas draudzenes un lieto pārāk daudz alkohola. Aizkaitināts un apreibis, viņš raksta blogus, ielaužas universitāšu mājas lapās un zog studentu attēlus, lai tos izvietotu savā, tikko izveidotajā mājas lapā. Šajā rudens naktī pamazām dzimst ideja par šobrīd pasaulē lielākā sociālā tīkla facebook izveidi.

programme.title: Trīs musketieri: Milēdija
programme.desc: Musketieri nolemj apvienot spēkus ar noslēpumaino Milēdiju. Viņu plāns ir apturēt ienaidniekus, kamēr Francijas Karaliste ir sašķelta reliģisko karu dēļ un joprojām ir pakļauta britu draudiem.

programme.title: Es gribu tevi atpakaļ
programme.desc: Nupat kā par vientuļniekiem kļuvušie trīsdesmitgadnieki Pīters un Emma nolēmuši sadarboties, lai sabotētu savu bijušo jaunās attiecības un atgūtu viņus uz visiem laikiem.

programme.title: Sociālais tīkls
programme.desc: Kādā rudens naktī Harvardas students Marks Cukerbergs, kas ir datorprogrammēšanas ģēnijs, pārdzīvo šķiršanos no savas draudzenes un lieto pārāk daudz alkohola. Aizkaitināts un apreibis, viņš raksta blogus, ielaužas universitāšu mājas lapās un zog studentu attēlus, lai tos izvietotu savā, tikko izveidotajā mājas lapā. Šajā rudens naktī pamazām dzimst ideja par šobrīd pasaulē lielākā sociālā tīkla facebook izveidi.

programme.title: Best Baker in America
programme.desc: Cooking competition show in which professional and home bakers compete in a baking tournament. For six weeks, eight skilled bakers are challenged to use their style and technical abilities to make stunning, tasty treats and impress the judges - from macarons, fruit tarts, creme brulee to spectacular and elaborately-decorated cakes. One person gets eliminated every week by the panel of judges, until the final where the best three bakers compete for the grand prize of $25,000 and the title of Best Baker in America.

programme.title: Next Baking Master: Paris
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 4. Cooking competition.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: Selena + Moos Craft Barbecue. Selena Gomez tries the best Texas BBQ in Los Angeles at Moos Craft Barbecue. Then, Selena puts her own spin on their meat-centric menu.

programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures
programme.desc: Cooking doesnt have to be difficult, nor does it require extravagant ingredients that are hard to find. From her home kitchen in Sweden, Rachel Khoo shares her secrets to cooking, providing viewers with delectable recipes created from easy-to-source ingredients, and guaranteeing enjoyment when it comes to rustling up dinner. Though her recipes are laced with simplicity, they are packed with flavour and she encourages viewers to recreate these mouthwatering fares.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: Selena + Lemon Grove. At Chef Marcel Vignerons Lemon Grove, Selena Gomez creates a colourful dish with unusual ingredients. Will Marcel make the dish his new special?

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: Selena + Girl and The Goat. Selena Gomez steps up her game in Stephanie Izards kitchen. For her special, Selena makes a ricotta toast inspired by cheese and crackers.

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: Selena Gomez and Shirley Chung make a fusion version of a beloved childhood dish. Later, Selena tries to deliver a dish good enough for the Ms Chis menu.

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: Selena Gomez feels the pressure at Alta, Keith Corbins California restaurant. Later, she makes a fried fish dish for Atlas toughest critic, Renee Corbin.

programme.title: Candy Land
programme.desc: Five teams of professional cake makers compete in a series of testing challenges, with the winning team taking home a whopping $25,000. Each team is challenged to create a stunning, edible showpiece, but they are also given further instructions as the show progresses. They must use all of their artistry, flair and baking talent to have any chance of impressing the judges and taking home the winnings.

programme.title: Best Baker in America
programme.desc: Cooking competition show in which professional and home bakers compete in a baking tournament. For six weeks, eight skilled bakers are challenged to use their style and technical abilities to make stunning, tasty treats and impress the judges - from macarons, fruit tarts, creme brulee to spectacular and elaborately-decorated cakes. One person gets eliminated every week by the panel of judges, until the final where the best three bakers compete for the grand prize of $25,000 and the title of Best Baker in America.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Summer Baking Championship
programme.desc: The final bakers go out with a bang as they create red, white and "woo-hoo" desserts and 4th of July exploding fireworks cakes for the $25,000 prize!

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Lobster Rolls. Inspired by her honeymoon in Maine, Joanna makes lobster rolls, hush puppies, wedge salad with blue cheese dressing and cherries jubilee.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Italian Eats. Joanna makes an Italian meal including pink baked ziti, roasted garlic parmesan toast and antipasto salad with sun-dried tomato vinaigrette.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures
programme.desc: Cooking doesnt have to be difficult, nor does it require extravagant ingredients that are hard to find. From her home kitchen in Sweden, Rachel Khoo shares her secrets to cooking, providing viewers with delectable recipes created from easy-to-source ingredients, and guaranteeing enjoyment when it comes to rustling up dinner. Though her recipes are laced with simplicity, they are packed with flavour and she encourages viewers to recreate these mouthwatering fares.

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: Selena + CUT Steakhouse. At Wolfgang Pucks gorgeous CUT steakhouse, Selena Gomez takes on two initiation tests before creating her own spicy seafood dish.

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: Selena + Lemon Grove. At Chef Marcel Vignerons Lemon Grove, Selena Gomez creates a colourful dish with unusual ingredients. Will Marcel make the dish his new special?

programme.title: Dinner: Impossible
programme.desc: Ghost Town Gourmet. Robert Irvine heads to an abandoned mining town in Cerro Gordo, CA. He prepares a meal using the same ingredients and equipment as the miners had in 1865.

programme.title: Dinner: Impossible
programme.desc: Mission in Paradise. Robert Irvine makes a feast without a kitchen for 30 people in Oahu, Hawaii. He battles the weather and manages an unpredictable underground oven.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri heads back for some creative Southern comfort in Atlanta, a mighty meatball bake in New York and a righteous Reuben in Indianapolis.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri loads up on over-the-top turkey legs in Tennessee before hitting up unbelievable blueberry pierogies and top-notch tots in New York.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri checks in on some amped-up American eats, like funky fritters in Phoenix, mind-blowing pancakes in New York and snapper soup in Indiana.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: Новости: a news report from Ukraine with details of the latest national and international stories.

programme.title: Bēdīgi slavenie mērgļi
programme.desc: Vāciešu okupētajā Francijā Šosanna Dreifusa kļūst par liecinieci tam, kā nacistu pulkvedis Hanss Landa noslepkavo viņas ģimeni. Šosannai par mata tiesu izdodas izsprukt un aizbēgt uz Parīzi, kur viņa pieņem citu identitāti un kļūst par kinoteātra īpašnieci. Tajā pašā laikā kaut kur citur Eiropā leitnants Aldo Reins sapulcina grupu ebreju kareivju, kuru mērķis ir atriebties ienaidniekam. Nacistiem šis grupējums kļūst pazīstams ar nosaukumu "mērģļi". Reina grupējumam pievienojas jauna vācu aktrise un slepenā aģente Bridžeta fon Hameršmarka, kuras uzdevums ir gāzt Trešā reiha vadoņus. Likteņa pavērsieni saved visus kopā ar Šosannu, kurai ir pašai savs atriebības plāns….

programme.title: Sliktie kaimiņi
programme.desc: Kellijai un Mekam šķiet, ka viņi kopā ar jaundzimušo bērnu ir pārcēlušies uz klusu rajonu, taču tad kaimiņos ievācas studentu korporācijas puiši. Tedijs ir korporācijas prezidents, un Pīts ir viņa vietnieks. Puiši naski pieņem draudzības piedāvājumu, kad Kellija un Meks ierodas iepazīties. Tomēr drīz vien laulātajam pārim ir jāsauc talkā policija jauno kaimiņu savaldīšanai. Šī rīcība izraisa šausminošas sekas.

programme.title: Meklēšana
programme.desc: Kad pazūd Deivida Kima 16 gadus vecā meita, viņš pirmoreiz dzīvē iedziļinās meitas sociālo tīklu pasaulē, kura atklāj daudz vairāk, nekā sākotnēji šķita... Filma uzdod tiešus un neērtus jautājums, kas attiecināmu uz ikvienu, – cik daudz no sevis mēs mūsdienās uzticam sociālajiem tīkliem? Ko tie par mums stāsta, un kā ar mums ir iespējams manipulēt?

programme.title: Ragana
programme.desc: Ir 17. gs. 30. gadi Jaunanglijā. Viljamam (Ralfs Ainsons) un viņa ģimenei draud izraidīšana no ciemata, jo radies strīds ar baznīcu par Jauno Derību, tādēļ ģimene nolemj pamest ciematu. Galu galā viņi apmetas fermā savāda meža malā. Kad iet bojā iesētais, ģimene viens otru tur aizdomās paranojas iespaidā un ģimenes aizdomas vēršas pret meitu Tomasinu (Anja Tailore-Džoja). Ģimenes un fermas locekļiem liecoties zem savu aizdomu smaguma, Tomasinu sāk apsūdzēt raganu burvestībās.

programme.title: Auniņš Šons filma: Fermagedons
programme.desc: Netālu no auniņa Šona fermas ir avarējis piemīlīgās un draiskās citplanētietes Lu-Las kosmosa kuģis. Lu-Las neparasto spēju, nebeidzamo blēņu un galaktikas mēroga atraugu apburts, Šons nolemj palīdzēt savai jauniegūtajai draudzenei atgriezties mājās, nenojaušot, ka nežēlīga citplanētiešu mednieku organizācija jau dzen viņiem pēdas. Vai Šons un viņa bars spēs novērst Fermagedonu, pirms nav par vēlu?

programme.title: Tuksneša prinči
programme.desc: Berberu puisēna un viņa drauga kamieļa piedzīvojumi, šķērsojot tuksnesi.

programme.title: Bēbis boss
programme.desc: Tims Templtons ir savu vecāku uzmanības centrā. Un tā tas ir līdz brīdim, kad viņš satiek savu jauno brālīti – jaundzimušo pieguļošā uzvalkā ar uzņēmēja iemaņām. Abi kašķējas kā jau visi brāļi, izmantojot gan pazemojošas izjokošanas, gan tuvcīņas. Tomēr viņi beidz savas domstarpības, kad bēbis boss atklāj savu ģeniālo plāno, kā iegūt atpakaļ uzmanību, kas veltīta viņu galvenajiem konkurentiem kucēniem. Abi savāc pilsētas mazo bērnu bandu un ar šīs dīvainās komandas palīdzību mēģina izjaukt gaidāmo pasākumu mājdzīvniekiem, lai atgūtu mazuļu likumīgo vietu mīlīguma hierarhijā.

programme.title: Viesnīca "Transilvānija" 3: Mošķu brīvdienas
programme.desc: Monstru ģimene šoreiz dodas brīvdienās. Luksusa kruīza kuģis aizvedīs Drakulu prom no rūpēm par viesnīcas apmeklētāju labsajūtu. Un kas ir atpūta bez draugiem, kuri tāpat ar prieku metas baudīt kuģa sniegtās izklaides! Taču, kad Drakula iemīlas noslēpumainajā kapteinē Ērikā, viņš vēl nenojauš, ka Ērika ir monstru lielākā ienaidnieka Ābrahama van Helsinga pēctece un sākas mošķu cienīga drāma.

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Mīlīgā mazpilsētiņā atrodas melna māja ar nedzīvu zālāju. Kaimiņi pat nenojauš, ka zem mājas atrodas milzu paslēptuve. Sīku pakalpiņu armijas apsargāts, Grū kaldina plānus lielākajai laupīšanai pasaules vēsturē. Viņš ir iecerējis nolaupīt Mēnesi. Jā, Mēnesi! Grū patīk viss ļaunais. Bruņojies ar samazināšanas lāzeru, sasaldēšanas staru un dažnedažādiem kaujas transporta līdzekļiem braukšanai pa zemi un pa gaisu, viņš iznīdē visu, kas gadās ceļā, līdz kādu dienu sastop trīs bārenītes ar apbrīnojamu gribasspēku…

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Kamēr bijušais dižais ļaundaris Gru sāk iejusties ģimenes cilvēka lomā un mēģina godīgi pelnīt iztiku, pārdodot ievārījumu, Antarktīdā kāds nozog slepenu laboratoriju. Ļaunuma apkarošanas organizācijai ir nepieciešama palīdzība, un tās pārstāvji ierodas pie Gru. Kopā ar organizācijas ekscentrisko aģenti Lūsiju Vaildu viņš secina, ka galvenais aizdomās turamais ir par mirušu uzskatītais supernelietis El Mačo, kura dēls ir ieskatījies Gru vecākajā meitā Margo. Pārlieka vēlēšanās pasargāt meitas un arvien pieaugošās simpātijas pret Lūsiju aizmiglo Gru prātu, tādēļ meklējumi nevedas. Tikmēr kāds nelietis paklusām nolaupa Gru palīgus.

programme.title: Kaskadieris
programme.desc: Kolts ir kaskadieris, un, tāpat kā visi kaskadieri, darbā viņš tiek spridzināts, sašauts, avarē, lec laukā pa logiem un krīt no augstākajām virsotnēm – tas viss mūsu izklaidei. Tagad šim strādnieku šķiras varonim pēc negadījuma, kas teju maksā viņam dzīvību, ir jāatrod pazudusi kinozvaigzne, jāatrisina sazvērestība uzņemšanas laukumā un jāmēģina atgūt mūža mīlestība Džodija, vienlaikus darot savu ikdienas darbu. Kas te var nenoiet greizi?

programme.title: Ugunīgi ass
programme.desc: Iedvesmojošs stāsts par Ričardu Montanezu, uzkodu ražotāja "Frito Lay" apkopēju, kurš, pateicoties savai meksikāņu izcelsmei, palīdzēja sapurināt pārtikas industriju, palīdzot radīt vienus no visu laiku populārākajiem čipsiem "Flamin Hot Cheetos".

programme.title: Venoms: Būs slaktiņš
programme.desc: Edijs Broks mēģina pielāgoties savai jaunajai dzīvei, esot citplanētiešu simbiota Venoma saimniekam, kas viņam piešķīris pārcilvēciskas spējas, lai viņš būtu nāvējoši modrs. Intervējot sērijveida slepkavu Kletusu Kasadiju, kurš kļūst par simbiota Carnage vadītāju un pēc neveiksmīgas nāvessoda izpildes izbēg no cietuma, Broks mēģina atjaunot savu karjeru.

programme.title: Robota bērns
programme.desc: Kādu pusaugu meiteni pazemes bunkurā gādīgi uzaudzina robots "Māte", kura uzdevums ir atjaunot cilvēku populāciju pēc cilvēces izmiršanas globālā katastrofā. Tomēr meitenes un robota īpašā saikne tiek apdraudēta, kad viņu patvērumā nez no kurienes ierodas svešiniece ar satraucošām ziņām.

programme.title: Izbrauciens
programme.desc: Bens Bārbers (Kevins Hārts) gatavojas precēties ar saderināto Andželu (Tika Samptere), kura ir viņa policijas partnera Džeimsa (Aiss Kjūbs) māsa. Policistus nosūta uzdevumā uz Maiami, lai izmeklētu nežēlīgā narkotiku tirgoņa Antonio Poupa (Bendžamins Brats) nodarījumus, par kuru ir zināms, ka tas apgādā visu Maiami ar narkotikām. Viņi apvienojas ar bezkompromisu detektīvi Maju (Olīvija Manna) un dodas pārtraukt Poupa darbību. Spriedze palielinās, tuvojoties Bena un Andželas kāzām.

programme.title: Svešinieki: 1. nodaļa
programme.desc: Kad dīvainā mazpilsētā salūst viņu auto, jauns pāris ir spiesta pavadīt nakti nomaļā būdā. Izceļas panika, jo abus sāk terorizēt trīs maskās tērpti svešinieki, kuri uzbrūk bez žēlastības un, šķiet, bez motīva. Šausmu filmas galvenajās lomās: Madelaina Petša (seriāls "Riverdale"), Gabriels Baso ("Vasaras karaļi", "Super 8") un Oskara balvas laureāte Reičela Šentone ("The Silent Child").

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Superļaundaris Gru ir izmests no darba, jo neapturēja jaunāko cilvēces apdraudētāju. Viņš zaudē dzīvesprieku, bet to atgūst, kad uzzina, ka viņa neredzētais dvīņubrālis Dru vēlas viņu satikt. Gru ar ģimeni dodas uz brāļa grezno dzīvesvietu. Brāļi kopā uzsāks cīņu pret Baltazaru Bretu, kurš bērnībā bija slavenība, taču tagad kļuvis par superļaundari, kurš terorizē pasauli. Minioni uzsāk protesta streiku pret to, ka Gru vispār neinteresē iespēja valdīt pār pasauli.

programme.title: Kā pieradināt pūķi
programme.desc: Vikingu pusaudzis Hikaps dzīvo Berkas salā kopā ar savu valdonīgo tēvu. Kaujas ar pūķiem ir vikingu ikdiena un dzīves veids, taču Hikapu tās neaizrauj. Tā vietā viņš labprātāk nododas visvisādiem izgudrojumiem un apkārtnes iepazīšanai. Reiz kādā no saviem klejojumiem Hikaps sastop ievainotu pūķi, kuram palīdz atkal lidot. Šī sastapšanās maina abu dzīves. Un, kad pienāk iesvētību laiks – lielā iespēja kaujā ar pūķiem sevi pierādīt tēvam un visai ciltij –, Hikaps rīkojas pavisam neparasti.

programme.title: Trusītis Pēterītis
programme.desc: Ir mierpilna diena vienā no skaistākajām Anglijas vietām. Putniņi mīlīgi čivina, strautiņš urdz, un saule apmirdz zaļos pakalnus. Te pēkšņi cauri zālājam aizšaujas pūkains kamoliņš. Tas ir trusītis Pēterītis, un viņš dodas ļoti svarīgā misijā. Kopā ar trim māsiņām trusītis Pēterītis spriņģo taisnā ceļā uz Makgregora kunga mazdārziņa pusi. Tur izaudzēti labu labie dārzeņi, kas tā vien prasās tik apēsti. Taču reiz namā uz dzīvi apmetas Makgregora kunga radinieks, kurš par nelūgtajiem dārza labumu čiepējiem nemaz nav sajūsmā. Tā sākas nikni ķīviņi, jautri piedzīvojumi un daudz nepatikšanu, kurās trusītis Pēterītis kopā ar draugiem pamanīsies iekulties.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Mēs atkal esam klāt
programme.desc: Pēc Donnas nāves Sofija gatavojas piepildīt mātes ilgi loloto sapni – atvērt viesnīcu. Tomēr gaidāmos svētkus aizēno domstarpības ar Skaju, kurš strādā Ņujorkā un pat nenojauš par... gaidāmo bērniņu! Kā Sofija tiks ar visu galā viena pati? Par laimi, palīgā nāk mammas draudzenes, kuras izstāsta Sofijai, ar kādu drosmi un pārliecību savulaik šai vietā jaunu dzīvi uzsāka viņas māte. Tālajā 1979. gadā jaunā Donna nupat kā bija absolvējusi universitāti un gatavojās ceļot pa pasauli. Parīzē viņa satika Hariju, kurš, par spīti savam naivumam, viņu spēja apburt. Vēlāk, nokavējusi prāmi uz Kalokairi, Donna iepazinās ar Bilu, kurš piedāvāja viņu aizvest. Un tad... Tad Donna sastapa Semu, kurā neprātīgi iemīlējās, taču viņš salauza Donnas sirdi, bet ne spēcīgo garu.

programme.title: Bils un Teds nozog mūziku
programme.desc: Bils un Teds ir iestrēguši pusmūža problēmās. Abi ar sievām apmeklē pāru terapiju un nezaudē cerību īstenot mūziķu karjeru. Kādu dienu pie viņiem ierodas viešņa no nākotnes ar vēsti, ka tikai viņu radīta dziesma var glābt pasauli. Abi draugi dodas piedzīvojumā, lai beidzot piepildītu savu likteni. Ceļā viņiem palīdz meitas, dažādi vēsturiski tēli un vairākas mūzikas leģendas – kopīgi viņi meklē ideālo dziesmu, kas izglābs pasauli.

programme.title: Bada garša
programme.desc: Kāds pāris ziedo visu, tikai lai saņemtu visaugstāko atzinību pavārmākslas pasaulē — Michelin zvaigzni.

programme.title: Dinozauriņš Diplodoks
programme.desc: Titulētais dinozauriņš dodas piedzīvojumā, lai glābtu savus vecākus, kuri pazuduši mīklainos apstākļos. Ceļā viņš sastaps ne vien burvi un divus dīvainus zinātniekus, bet arī fantastiskas būtnes un nokļūs apbrīnojamās vietās.

programme.title: Ceļvedis
programme.desc: Uz patiesiem notikumiem balstītais stāsts par afroamerikāņu klasiskās mūzikas un džeza pianistu Donu Šērliju, kurš 1962. gadā kopā ar nolīgto šoferi un miesassargu Toniju Vallelongu devās koncerttūrē ASV dienvidu štatos. Tonijs Lips, mazizglītots bāra apsargs itāļu apdzīvotā rajonā Ņujorkā, saņem piedāvājumu kļūt par pasaules līmeņa melnādainā pianista, doktora Dona Šērlija šoferi koncertturnejā no Manhetenas līdz pat dienvidu štatiem. Viņi dodas braucienā, ņemot līdzi ceļvedi, kurā atzīmēti tie retie iestādījumi, kas ir droši afroamerikāņiem. Ceļojuma laikā viņi saskaras gan ar rasismu, gan ar negaidītu cilvēcību, un, par spīti abu atšķirīgumam, abu starpā uzplaukst patiesa draudzība. Mākslas filma 2019. gadā ieguvusi trīs "Oskarus" – kategorijās "Labākā pilnmetrāžas filma", "Labākais scenārijs" un "Labākais aktieris otrā plāna lomā". Tonija lomas atveidotājs Vigo Mortensens ir dāņu izcelsmes amerikāņu aktieris, kurš var lepoties ar lomu daudzveidību, tostarp triloģijā "Gredzenu pavēlnieks", Deivida Kronenberga krimināldrāmā "Vardarbības pēctecība" un daudzās citās. Donu Šērliju atveido godalgotais aktieris Maheršala Ali, kurš popularitāti guva ar detektīva Veina lomu ASV kulta TV drāmā "Patiesais detektīvs".

programme.title: Nedžentlmeniskas karadarbības ministrija
programme.desc: Neticams un noklusēts patiess stāsts par pašu pirmo īpašo spēku organizāciju, ko Otrā pasaules kara laikā dibināja Vinstons Čērčils un neliela militāro ierēdņu grupa. Slepenā kaujas vienība, ko veidoja raibum raiba neliešu un disidentu kompānija, devās riskantā misijā pret nacistiem, izmantojot neierastas un pilnībā "nedžentlmeniskas" cīņas tehnikas. Viņu bezbailīgā pieeja mainīja kara gaitu un ielika pamatus mūsdienu slepeno operāciju karadarbībai.

programme.title: Mans spiegs
programme.desc: Rūdītais CIP aģents Džeidžejs tiek pazemināts amatā un nosūtīts misijā novērot deviņgadīgās Sofijas ģimeni. Kad meitene atrod dzīvoklī slepenās kameras, viņa izseko to signālam un atklāj novērošanas operāciju pārraudzības vietu. Solot nenodot atklātībai Džeidžeja aizsegu, Sofija pierunā aģentu veltīt viņai laiku un apmācīt spiegošanas prasmēs. Lai gan sākotnēji piedāvājums viņā raisa skepsi, Džeidžejs aptver, ka gudrībā un atjautībā ar Sofiju viņš mēroties nevar.

programme.title: Spiegs, kurš mani pameta
programme.desc: Divas labākās draudzenes, trīsdesmitgadnieces Odrija un Morgana, pašas pret savu gribu tiek ierautas starptautiskā sazvērestībā, kad viņu dzīvoklī pēkšņi uzrodas Odrijas bijušais draugs, kurš, kā izrādās, ir spiegs. Viņam uz papēžiem min algoti slepkavas, no kuriem tagad ir jāglābjas arī abām draudzenēm. Bēgot cauri visai Eiropai, draudzenes neticamā kārtā sveikā izkļūst no visām briesmām, turklāt pa ceļam vēl izdomā plānu, kā izglābt pasauli.

programme.title: Venoms
programme.desc: Reportiera Edija Broka pētījumu lokā ir tēmas, uz ko valdība piever acis. Veicot žurnālistisko izmeklēšanu, Broks nejauši nonāk kontaktā ar ārpuszemes simbiotu, kas pārņem viņa ķermeni. Savienojumā ar simbiotu Broks iegūst superspējas un kļūst par fascinējošo varoni Venomu. Nu viņam jāsadarbojas ar šo parazītisko dzīvības formu ķermenī, lai izglābtu savu dzīvību.

programme.title: Cīņus sports: One Championship. ONE Friday Fights
programme.desc: Coverage from the ONE Championship; martial arts competitions which include mixed martial arts (MMA), Muay Thai, and kickboxing. Enjoy all the action with top-class competitors from across Asia and the world.

programme.title: Futbols: Bundesliga. Leverkusen - Eintracht
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: Noche UFC: Diego Lopes vs Jean Silva
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: Basketbols: WNBA. Connecticut - Phoenix
programme.desc: Get the best moments of the Womens National Basketball Association, a professional basketball league in the United States. It currently is composed of twelve teams. The regular season is played from May to September, the All Star game is played midway through the season in July and the WNBA Finals at the end of September until the beginning of October.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Real Sociedad - Real Madrid
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

Living Aloha
programme.desc: Married team Kamohai and Tristyn Kalama take on house-flipping projects on the island of Oahu, Hawaii, the most difficult flipping location in the US.

programme.title: Down Home Fab
programme.desc: Chelsea and Cole take on the remodel of a couples multimillion-dollar home, and the results could impact their design destiny.

programme.title: First Home Fix
programme.desc: Design team Raisa Kuddus and Austin Coleman use low-cost, high-impact design and homeowner sweat equity to transform the houses of first-time homebuyers.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home International
programme.desc: A spin-off of My Lottery Dream Home that follows British interior designer Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen as he tries to help a number of lottery winners from Europe find a perfect home. Dive into the exciting world of real estate, and join Laurence as he travels across the United Kingdom and Europe looking for amazing properties for his clients - from castles, mansions, to cottages, and much more.

programme.title: My Mortgage Free Home
programme.desc: Property series. Amanda Lamb is on a mission to help people achieve their dream: to find their perfect house and leave behind the shackles of mortgage payments. Property expert Amanda finds four properties and invites homeowners to view them. Will they find their ideal home and relocate without the burden of monthly mortgage repayments?

programme.title: Mediterranean Life
programme.desc: Few places share the magical sparkle of the Mediterranean coastline, with many dreaming of one day purchasing property in this idyllic region. This reality series follows potential homeowners from the US as they look to find their dream property on the Med. From the extravagant luxuries of the French Riviera to the slower pace of life on the island of Sicily, each destination is engulfed in picturesque beaches, turquoise waters and unparalleled culture.

programme.title: Chasing the West
programme.desc: Jonathan and Drew take on two couples pooling their money for a shared California property. Plus, a single woman is ready to put down roots in Arizona.

programme.title: Castle Impossible
programme.desc: Daphne and Ian look to reinstate one of the original chateau bedrooms that once hosted real Kings and Queens of France. They plan an ornate resto.

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Rehab Addict is a TV show documenting home renovations, hosted by a charming designer Nicole Curtis. Nicole is a strong supporter of the idea of preservation and restoration of existing architecture when possible instead of its destruction. Her philosophy is to "restore old homes to their former glory" rather than modernization. She has revived historic homes in Michigan, Ohio and Minnesota and saved them from the wrecking ball. Nicole deals with the government bureaucrats, creates a team and together they go above and beyond to bring back former glory to the old buildings. Nicole is a bundle of energy and a perfect source of motivation and inspiration.

programme.title: Home Town

All the meanwhile they both ensure the homes are renovated at a low budgeted rate. Are they able to create beautiful homes for the people of Mississippi without damaging the infrastructure of the house too much? This fun-loving reality series has been running since 2016.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are ready to wrangle some wild deals in the Lone Star State. Along the way, the guys test-drive a 1968 Buick Riviera, become riveted by a blacksmiths anvil collection, and meet up with NFL legend, Emmitt Smith.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Join host Tony Harris as he investigates the most mysterious content ever captured and attempts to unearth the truth. Employing the assistance of experts and state-of-the-art technology, Tony is determined to decipher whether these photos, videos and audio recordings of purported supernatural and paranormal events are falsified or for real. He meets with eyewitnesses, conducts tests and stops at nothing to determine the truth.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: A man believes he recorded bigfoot calls on video while foraging for mushrooms. Are rock paintings discovered in India proof that weve never been alone? And has one of our experts captured a fleet of UFOs on film crossing in front of the sun?

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: American Pickers is an American reality series that follows ingenious "pickers" Mike Wolfe, and his business partner, Frank Fritz, as they hunt down objects with historical, collectible and pop culture value. They travel around the United States to buy or "pick" various items for resale, for clients, or for their own personal collections. Danielle Colby is in charge of their office of Antique Archaeology.

programme.title: Shipping Wars
programme.desc: Groups of independent shippers compete with each other in this American reality series, as they bid for the right to haul unconventional items that many conventional carriers deem unfeasible to transport. The crews must first win the right to ship the items by bidding on uShip, an online auction house that is one of the largest of its kind in the world. Once they have won the contract, they prepare the items for shipping, which is often easier said than done. The crews performances are scrutinised throughout, and their operational abilities are pushed to their limits as they transport both bizarre and tricky shipments across the country.

programme.title: Greatest Heists with Pierce Brosnan
programme.desc: An armoured-car depot employee uses his insider knowledge to plan a heist that could net him, and the longtime friends he recruits, more than $18 million in cash.

programme.title: Engineering an Empire
programme.desc: Documentary series, hosted by Peter Weller, an actor and a professor at Syracuse University, that explores the engineering and architectural achievements that were characteristic of some of the greatest civilizations on this planet - Rome, Egypt, Greece, the Aztecs, the Maya, Russia, China, the Persians, the Byzantines, Britain, France, and Italy in the late 15th and 16th centuries. Using interviews with experts, re-enactments, and computer-generated graphics, this programme looks at various structures, buildings and mechanical inventions, from Menes dam built in around 3000 BC in Egypt to the worlds first locomotive invented in Britain.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: Following the release of declassified FBI documents pertaining to the death of Adolf Hitler, a team of world-renowned investigators ask the question of whether he really killed himself in a bunker in Berlin. The report states that "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Using modern technology and updated investigation techniques, they will try to define what actually happened to the man who plunged the world into war in 1939. Their investigation will lead them towards a mysterious bunker in Argentina, a missing U-Boat and a potential safe house. Historical documentary series narrated by Dave Hoffman.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Documentary series exploring the history of Earths greatest man-made structures and creations. Where Did It Come From? reveals the earliest examples of brilliance and ingenuity from past pioneers. From the Roman highway project; a civil engineering feat establishing a network of unprecedented highways, to Egypts iconic structures, this series reveals the incomprehensible ides brought to life by magnificent minds, and in some cases, brutal slavery. Join host Michael Guillen as he dives into this fascinating world of both civil and social engineering, born out of ideas we still use today.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Historical documentary series that visits a range of diverse modern cities including Istanbul, New York, Rome, London, Cairo, and Sydney. By travelling underneath the streets and roads we use today, we learn about the fascinating pasts and ancient secrets of these incredible places.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. programme.title: Breaking Mysterious
programme.desc: Join host Jimmy Church and his team of truth-seeking investigators as they examine some of the biggest mysteries, extraordinary phenomena and unconventional conspiracy theories in America. Episodes include investigating a plot to assassinate President John F. Kennedy just weeks before his actual, tragic assassination in Dallas with vital new information being obtained from one of the Presidents secret servicemen; debating the possibility that a popular virtual smartphone game could actually be part of a CIA mind control operation; or tracking the events when a nuclear weapon goes missing off the coast of Georgias Tybee Island. Follow the team as they seek disclosure, answers and the truth in this adventurous series.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Zahi journeys in to the Five Chambers with the fellows in tow. Together they will document the ancient graffiti on the walls of the Chambers, proving Zahis theory that ancient Egyptians, not slaves, built the Pyramids at Giza.

Kennedy just weeks before his actual, tragic assassination in Dallas with vital new information being obtained from one of the Presidents secret servicemen; debating the possibility that a popular virtual smartphone game could actually be part of a CIA mind control operation; or tracking the events when a nuclear weapon goes missing off the coast of Georgias Tybee Island. Follow the team as they seek disclosure, answers and the truth in this adventurous series.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Zahi journeys in to the Five Chambers with the fellows in tow. Together they will document the ancient graffiti on the walls of the Chambers, proving Zahis theory that ancient Egyptians, not slaves, built the Pyramids at Giza.

programme.title: Engineering an Empire
programme.desc: Documentary series, hosted by Peter Weller, an actor and a professor at Syracuse University, that explores the engineering and architectural achievements that were characteristic of some of the greatest civilizations on this planet - Rome, Egypt, Greece, the Aztecs, the Maya, Russia, China, the Persians, the Byzantines, Britain, France, and Italy in the late 15th and 16th centuries. Using interviews with experts, re-enactments, and computer-generated graphics, this programme looks at various structures, buildings and mechanical inventions, from Menes dam built in around 3000 BC in Egypt to the worlds first locomotive invented in Britain.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: Following the release of declassified FBI documents pertaining to the death of Adolf Hitler, a team of world-renowned investigators ask the question of whether he really killed himself in a bunker in Berlin. The report states that "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Using modern technology and updated investigation techniques, they will try to define what actually happened to the man who plunged the world into war in 1939. Their investigation will lead them towards a mysterious bunker in Argentina, a missing U-Boat and a potential safe house. Historical documentary series narrated by Dave Hoffman.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Documentary series exploring the history of Earths greatest man-made structures and creations. Where Did It Come From? reveals the earliest examples of brilliance and ingenuity from past pioneers. From the Roman highway project; a civil engineering feat establishing a network of unprecedented highways, to Egypts iconic structures, this series reveals the incomprehensible ides brought to life by magnificent minds, and in some cases, brutal slavery. Join host Michael Guillen as he dives into this fascinating world of both civil and social engineering, born out of ideas we still use today.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Historical documentary series that visits a range of diverse modern cities including Istanbul, New York, Rome, London, Cairo, and Sydney. By travelling underneath the streets and roads we use today, we learn about the fascinating pasts and ancient secrets of these incredible places.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

Kennedy just weeks before his actual, tragic assassination in Dallas with vital new information being obtained from one of the Presidents secret servicemen; debating the possibility that a popular virtual smartphone game could actually be part of a CIA mind control operation; or tracking the events when a nuclear weapon goes missing off the coast of Georgias Tybee Island.
