programme.title: NBA. Cleveland Cavaliers vs Houston Rockets
Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Slēpošanas laikā Barbapapas uzceļ milzīgu iglū. Barbabravo and Barbalibs sacenšas drosmīgumā. Barbagudrais rada putekļu sūkšanas robotu, kas lieliski spēlē futbolu. Barbabērni sarīko spēli pret robotiem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Brauni dodas uz pludmali, lai pavadītu brīvdienas, un, ierodoties tur, satiek bākas uzraugu Šantiju. Padingtons, Džonatans un Džūdija apgūst glābēju praksi un ar glābēja Teilora palīdzību izglābj Brauna kungu.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Kas rada dīvainos trokšņus alā? Džonatans domā, ka tā ir nāriņa, bet Padingtons nav pārliecināts Džūdija vēlas atrast fosiliju pludmalē, pārējiem, šķiet, veicas, izņemot viņu, vai Padingtons spēs palīdzēt?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mērei Greitvejai vajag daudz picas, un ātri! Bet, kad pieslēdzas Ātrmeistars, suņiem jānovērš viņa picas problēma. Kad ģimene pa Ātrmeistara ceļu nevar pagūt uz lidostu, Rabla komandai līdz izlidošanai jāuzbūvē jauns ceļš.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mēre Greitveja un Dakija Dū kungs vēlas nodemonstrēt savas izpletņlēkšanas prasmes. Taču, kad patraucē vējš, suņi palīdz viņiem lēkt ar izpletni uz zemes! Kad Vīleram un cūkai Trifelei nesanāk slidot, komanda rod risinājumu uz riteņiem!

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Pasaules Grāmatu dienā Padingtons palīdz Mateo atkal iemīlēt grāmatu lasīšanu un atklāt iemīļotāko tēlu, par kuru pārģērbties. Padingtons, Simi un Džonatans uz parka salas medī dinozauru, bet dinozauri taču vairs neeksistē, vai tiesa?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Kad Vindzoru dārzos sāk pazust lietas, Džonatans domā, ka pie vainas ir melnais caurums, tādēļ Padingtons dodas kosmosa misijā. Simi un Padingtons mēģina varavīksnes galā atrast podu ar zeltu pēc tam, kad ir nejauši saplēsuši Baza kaleidoskopu.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons uzbūvē robotu, vārdā Padingtrons, taču, lai tas strādātu, nepieciešams īsts draugs. Bazs ielūdz visus uz Divali svinībām, Padingtons ir viņa strādīgais asistents, bet vai viņiem abiem izdosies izbaudīt svētku noslēguma uguņošanu?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un Toka skrienas ar laiku, lai redzētu pirmo pilno Saules aptumsumu savā mūžā. Padingtons saņem izgudrotāja balvu Simi vietā, kad viņa ir pārāk sakautrējusies, lai atzītos, bet kādēļ gan viņa pēc tam izjūt greizsirdību un skumjas?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni apņēmas sarīkot izcilu šovu! Barbaliba grib uztaisīt vislabāko limonādi.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pirmoreiz bērni brauks ar vilcienu un pavadīs nakti viesnīcā. Barbabo rada lielisku sniegavīru.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis stāsta bērniem par piedzīvojumu ar vilku. Rīt būs barbabērnu pirmā skolas diena.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pastaigas laikā Barbapapas atrod megalītu. Barbagudrajam uznāk ģēnija cienīga iedvesma un viņš izgudro "Bam".

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabella lepni ģimenei paziņo, ka nolēmusi kļūt par princesi. Barbabravo nīkst no garlaicības, jo brāļi un māsas ir aizņemti un negrib ar viņu spēlēties.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Kādu dienu pēkšņi pazūd gaisma, un Pepas māja iegrimst tumsā. Noticis elektrības pārrāvums. Kamēr viņi gaida, kad elektrība atkal parādīsies, Pepa un Džordžs meklē lāpu un domā, kādas spēles spēlēt.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Kad mamma palīdz Trušu jaunkundzei ugunsdzēsēju depo, viņu izsauc nodzēst liesmas tēta nekontrolējamajam grilam!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Šodien ir tēta dzimšanas diena, bet viņam jādodas uz darbu. Kamēr viņš ir prom, mamma, Pepa un Džordžs sagatavo īpašu pārsteigumu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa dodas uz zebras Zojas pidžamu ballīti kopā ar aitiņu Sūziju, trusīti Rebeku, kaķenīti Kendiju un zilonīti Emīliju. Meitenes spēlē spēles un izklaidējas. Beidzot viņām uznāk miegs. Viņas iekārtojas guļammaisos un aizmieg.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ir nakts, un debesīs redzamas zvaigznes. Mamma un tētis ļauj Pepai un Džordžam uzvilkt mēteļus un iziet ārā skatīties zvaigznes. Zvaigznes izskatās mazas, bet, kad Pepa un Džordžs skatās caur teleskopu, tās šķiet lielākas.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Kad Pepa un Sūzija uzzina, ka pieaugušajiem visu dienu jāstrādā, viņas nolemj spēlēties veikalos. Drīz vien viņām tas apnīk.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa kopā ar ģimeni izbraucienā pamana varavīksni.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pedro ir lipīgs klepus, drīz vien saslimst arī pārējie bērni. Kad laiks doties, saslimst arī pieaugušie. Arī Gazeles jaunkundze. Dakteris Lācis iedod negaršīgas zāles, bet kas rūpēsies par viņu, kad viņš saslims?

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Tētim ir bibliotēkas grāmata, ko viņš paturējis par ilgu. Ģimene dodas uz bibliotēku to atdot un atrod vēl citas grāmatas, ko lasīt.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš atrod Doras pazudušo dzimšanas dienas torti, un visa ģimene sarīko viņai pārsteiguma ballīti! Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz Mēnesnīcai atrast Mēnesspuķi, lai visi varētu priecāties Mēnessgaismas fiestā.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni pielipuši pie televizora, tāpēc vecāki mudina viņus veidot raidījumus. Barbapapas apmeklē evolūcijas muzeju. Programmā: Zemes radīšana, Pirmskembrija perioda zemūdene un... dinozauri!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbazū gatavs palīdzēt, bet Barbagudrais un Barbabella ļaunprātīgi izmanto viņa labestību un padara viņu traku. Barbazū nejauši atklāj spēju atdarināt Barbatēti. Viņš to izmanto, lai sadalītu darbus brāļiem un māsām. Vai viņi to uzzinās?

Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pirmās Celtnieklīča bibliotēkas būvēšana ir bišu pilna. Tas pieprasa īpaši saldu celtniecības risinājumu. / Vectēvs Grants māca Čārdžeram visus savus labākos deju soļus lielām deju sacensībām. Vai noklīdušas disko bumbas dēļ viņi neiegūs pirmo vietu?

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Jaunais Fransuā pieredz Barbapapas dzimšanu. Barbatēti iesloga zoodārzā.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcis gaida iemīļotas TV zvaigznes jauno filmu. Bet vispirms vajadzīgs kinoteātris, kur to skatīties! Vectēvs pastāsta suņukiem par apslēptiem dārgumiem. Lai tos atrastu, komandai jāstrādā ķepu ķepā!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Cetnieklīča svētkos dziedās Sjerra Spīdošā, un vajadzīgi jauni instrumenti.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mērei Greitvejai vajag daudz picas, un ātri! Bet, kad pieslēdzas Ātrmeistars, suņiem jānovērš viņa picas problēma. Kad ģimene pa Ātrmeistara ceļu nevar pagūt uz lidostu, Rabla komandai līdz izlidošanai jāuzbūvē jauns ceļš.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Zābaciņš grib paaugties lielāks, lai drīkstētu vizināties karuseļos - taču kļūst milzīgs! Dora viņam palīdz atgūt ierasto izmēru. Mugursomai ir īpaša dāvana Dorai, bet tā nevar atvērties! Draugi dodas lūgt palīdzību vecmāmiņai.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Dvīņi ciemojas Barbagudrā istabā. Kādus sapņus sasniegtu, ja es būtu miljardieris?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ceļā uz Parīzi Barbapapas atklāj vislabāko muzeju - Luvru! Barbalala ir apņēmusies ievērot ačgārno dienu.

programme.title: Barbapapa

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora palīdz pelēnam Peresam salabot burvju zobu suku, lai varētu saņemt dāvanu par savu izkritušo zobu. Dora iepazīstas ar kāpuru Karlosu, kurš vēlas kļūt pr tauriņu! Lai tas notiktu, draugiem viņam jāatrod sviestogu cienasts.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni atrod dīvainu alu. Barbaliba stāsta par alām, un par to pārtapšanu. The Barbabērni nakšņo viesistabā. Bailēs no skapī mītošajiem briesmoņiem, viņi izliek ērmotus slazdus, lai noķertu tos.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma svin savas dzimšanas dienas. Barbabellai darba pilnas rokas, pieskatot pārējos. Barbabella pieskata Bali kaķēnus. Viņa baidās, kaut kas var noiet greizi, tāpēc nelaiž tos ārā. Barbamammai jāpalīdz kaķēniem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Mistera Stingrā dvīņi apciemo barbabērnus. Barbabērni sarīko dvīņiem dārgumu medības un atpūtu dabā. Barbapapas sodas jaunā piedzīvojumā... dārzā. Taču dzīvot dabā ir negaidīti sarežģīti.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtona pasaule kļūst daudz plašāka. Viņš izlaužas ārpus Vindzorgārdenas robežām un dodas arvien aizraujošākos piedzīvojumos. Braunu ģimene dodas atvaļinājumā uz jūras piekrasti, aicinot skatītājus uz brīnišķīgiem piedzīvojumiem, apmeklējot tādas jaunas vietas kā Dinozauru sala un pat melnais caurums. Un no Peru pie Padingtona ciemos atbrauc ļoti īpaša viešņa –Lūsijas tante!

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Vindzoru dārzos ir divi jauni varoņi - Misters Lieliskais un Retais Lācis, bet vai Džonatans un Džūdija būs sajūsmā? Džonatans tiek pasludināts par varoni pēc reta gnoma izglābšanas, bet vai glābšana bija tikpat varonīga kā viņa stāsti?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi atrod vectēva Grants laimīgi boulinga bumbu. Diemžēl Celtnieklīcī nav boulinga zāles... līdz šim! Kad pēkšņa superziedēšana sagūsta Motori, Liliju un Parka Reindžeri Rozu, suņiem jārod ziediem draudzīgs risinājums.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad stirnai Podziņai jāšķērso Celtnieklīča lidostas skrejceļš, Rabls un komanda zina, kas jābūvē. Rabls un komanda uzbūvē milzu skrituļdēli tantes Celtnes un Rivera šovam. Taču, kad tas zaudē kontroli, suņiem jādzenas pakaļ!

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons uzzina, ka kaijas mīl frī kartupeļus un darīs visu, lai tos iegūtu, bet vai viņš spēs nogādāt pusdienas, kamēr tās ir karstas? Bākas gaisma ir sabojājusies, un ir miglaina nakts, vai Padingtons var palīdzēt izglābt kuģi jūrā?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons vada dārgumu medības, lai atrastu kapteiņa Zaļbārža laupījumu, bet vai viņi paliks draugi un dalīsies? Ikviens vēlas uzvarēt smilšu pils konkursā un baudīt īpašu saldējuma balvu, bet galvenais ir komandas darbs!

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un Brauni glābj tuklīšu mazuļus, kuri, tā vietā, lai veiktu pirmo lidojumu, apmaldās apmetnē Padingtons kopā ar Džonatanu un Džūdiju izbauda niršanas piedzīvojumu - bet kur ir Džūdijas kaklarota?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Pludmalē valda nekārtība, bet vai visi atkritumi tiks savlaicīgi novākti līdz pludmales ballītei, ko visi ir tik ļoti gaidījuši? Vasaras brīvdienas ir beigušās, tāpēc ir pienācis laiks atvadīties no jaunajiem draugiem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma atgriežas pie koka, zem kura piedzima. Tas ir sliktā stāvoklī. Viņiem tas steidzami jāglābj. Ir Barbamazuļu dzimšanas diena. Viņi katrs grib kaut ko citādu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbamazuļi atrod ziloņu mazuli un slepeni par to rūpējas. Kā Barbatētis un Barbamamma reaģēs uz Borisu? Zilonis Boriss ilgojas pēc mājām. Barbapapas nolemj vest viņu atpakaļ uz Āfriku. Turpat viņi palīdz Borisam pielāgoties.

programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma paziņo bērniem, ka divatā dosies atpūsties uz Lieldienu salu. Barbabērni, dvīņi un Stingrā kungs dodas izbraucienā ar jahtu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Kurš gan negribētu zināt, par ko sapņo barbabērni, kamēr viņi mierīgi dus? Kurš gan negribētu zināt, par ko sapņo barbabērni, kamēr viņi mierīgi dus?

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar ģimeni dodas brīvdienās īpašā auto. Pepa ir pārsteigta, atklājot, ka ar pogas spiedienu tas pārvēršas par mājiņu, kurā gulēt.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Džordžam un trusītes Rebekas mazajam brālim Ričardam ir dinozauru rotaļlietas, bet viņiem nepadodas dalīties. Mamma parāda viņiem, ka ir daudz jautrāk, ja spēlējas kopā kā viņu lielās māsas.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar ģimeni devušies brīvdienās ar kemperu. Viņi nolemj apmeklēt Pīļu zemi, īpašu parku, kur var redzēt pīles upē. Viņi ir pārsteigti, uzzinot, ka kempers pārvēršas par laivu!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs aiznes dārzeņu mizas vectēva kompostam. Tārpi tvertnē pārvērš mizas par kompostu, ko vecvecāki izmanto, lai augi labāk augtu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Trusis Ričards ierodas spēlēties ar Džordžu, un aita Sūzija - ar Pepu! Puikas un meitenes negrib spēlēt tās pašas spēles, bet viņiem visiem patīk lēkāt dubļu peļķēs.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Tētis uzzina, ka ir grūti savākt naudu skolas jumtam, bet ir vieglāk skriet, kad dzenas pakaļ lapsene.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Tētis izkar savu tīro kreklu, lai to izžāvētu, bet Pepa, Džordžs un mamma notraipa to ar dubļiem. Viņi ieliek to mazgāties, bet Pepa ieliek arī savu sarkano kleitu, kas pārvērš tēta kreklu sārtu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs dodas izbraucienā ar laivu kopā ar vectēvu un papagaili Polliju, bet vēlāk vectēvs iemet ūdenī savu mobilo telefonu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepas franču draudzene ēzelīte Delfīna ierodas ciemos. Pepa paņem līdzi Delfīnu uz bērnudārzu, kur viņai iemāca "Bing, bong" dziesmu, kas patīk visai klasei.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pēc piedzīvotām likstām Barbabravo vairs nemaz nespēj pārtapt. Visa ģimene dodas viņam palīgā. Barbabravo nespēj nosēdēt mierā un ilgi koncentrēties vienai nodarbei. Barbalala piedāvā iemācīt viņam kontroli. Vai viņai izdosies?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni domā, ka ēdiens spēj likt tiem mainīt krāsu un formu, tāpēc izlemj atrast katram piemēroto ēdienu. Barbabo nav iedvesmas, tāpēc vairs nespēj radīt. Visa ģimene palīdz, iesakot jaunas zīmējumu tēmas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad komanda uzbūvē īpašu limonādes stendu Lūkasam un Lilija, īgnais Ātrmeistars ieripina to Celtnieklīča ielās. Kāpēc bebrs Krančijs šķērso ceļu? Jo Rabla komanda būvē tiltu, lai palīdzētu viņam nokļūt ceļa otrā pusē.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīci ir pārņēmis noslēpums. Kad pēkšņi pazūd pilsētnieku skulptūra, Rabla komandai pievienojas Čeiss, lai atrisinātu pazudušās statujas noslēpumu... un uzbūvētu gluži jaunu Zinātnes centru, lai palīdzētu izmeklēt.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Doras draugi krabīši grasās precēties, bet Garnadzis nočiepj gredzenu un pazaudē to okeānā. Dora dodas to meklēt. Dora un Zābaciņš satiek vikuņu Vikiju, kura pazaudējusi savu burvju flautu un nevar atgriezties Mākoņu valstībā.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbalala un ģimenes dzīve! Barbagudrais un Barbabo uzbūvē milzīgu koka rotaļlietu, ko darbina bio degviela.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Fermeri Zoju piemeklē likstas - ražu apēd neatlaidīga vāvere.

Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mēre Greitveja un Dakija Dū kungs vēlas nodemonstrēt savas izpletņlēkšanas prasmes. Taču, kad patraucē vējš, suņi palīdz viņiem lēkt ar izpletni uz zemes! Kad Vīleram un cūkai Trifelei nesanāk slidot, komanda rod risinājumu uz riteņiem!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi atrod vectēva Grants laimīgi boulinga bumbu. Diemžēl Celtnieklīcī nav boulinga zāles... līdz šim! Kad pēkšņa superziedēšana sagūsta Motori, Liliju un Parka Reindžeri Rozu, suņiem jārod ziediem draudzīgs risinājums.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Doras ģimene taisa pinjatu par godu māmiņas dzimšanas dienai, taču tā aizlido! Vai viņi to atradīs, pirms pārnāks māmiņa? Garnadzis nočiepj neredzamības segu un sāk čiept visu pēc kārtas. Dorai viņš jāaptur!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērniem ir garlaicīgi, jo ārā līst lietus. Barbagudrais uztaisa dekoderi, kas tulko dzīvnieku skaņas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni grib izgudrot, kā Da Vinči. Bērniem jāizlemj - doties baseinā vai izbraucienā ar riteņiem.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora palīdz Benijam un vienraga dinozauram Uni atgūt pazaudēto burvju otu, lai Uni varētu atgriezties pie sava mīļdzīvnieka Zaķradža. Dora palīdz rumpulītei Hārtijai, lai viņa beidzot varētu piedalīties Rumpuļu spēlēs.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo neprot zīmēt. Viņam piemetas žagas, no kurām netiek vaļā. Viņš jau grasās padoties, kad nejauši rada jaunu mākslas novirzienu. Barbaliba grib piedalīties rakstīšanas konkursā, taču brāļi un māsas neļauj koncentrēties.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabravo kā slepenais aģents vada izmeklēšanu, bruņojies ar saviem rīkiem, lai uzzinātu, kurš nozaga Barbatēta torti. Barbalala ir pārliecināta, ka dzirdēja milzu vistu klīstam pa māju. Barbabērni stāv sardzē.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Teilors atklāj, ka ir viņa dzimšanas diena, bet kā lai draugi to padara īpašu, ja viņi par to nezināja? Ir Bērnsa nakts, un Bērdas kundze pastāsta Padingtonam par retu radību, ko sauc par savvaļas hagisu. Vai tas viņus apciemos?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Ir Zemes diena, un Padingtonam ir svarīgs uzdevums - iestādīt koku, bet vai viņš atradīs ideālu vietu, pirms ir par vēlu? Bazs rīko pavasara ražas svētkus, un visi tos izbauda, ienesot savas tradīcijas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcim vajadzīga pasta nodaļa! Bet, kad celtni apsēž vāveres, suņiem jāizdomā risinājums. Rabla komanda izmanto savas būvniecības prasmes, lai pārveidotu super auto mazgātavu un nomazgātu fermeres Zojas sušķīgos dzīvniekus.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda strādā, lai pārvērstu Celtnieklīča pludmales promenādi spožā, svinīgā ziemas brīnumzemē. Kad sniegota diena izjauc Motores un Miksas Virpuļvāveres plānus, Rabla komanda dara to, ko prot vislabāk... būvē.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcī tiek uzbūvēta pirmā viesnīca, kad ciemos atbrauc fermeres Zojas brālēns Hedlijs. Kad juceklis uz dabas takas apmulsina visus Dakija Dū kunga dzimšanas dienas ballītes viesus, ķepaiņi viņiem palīdz atrast ceļu.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Džūdija atklāj savu iekšējo varoni, kad reindžeru nometnē sākas vētra un viņiem ir nepieciešams patvērums Padingtons sadraudzējas ar ātru gliemezi, kuru gaida varonīga nākotne, bet kāpēc viņa izskatās tik skumja?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un robots Padingtrons izbauda varoņu lomu Vindzoru dārzos, bet kas ir tās dīvainās emocijas, ko izjūt robots? Padingtons atklāj, kā būt mierīgam saspringtā situācijā, un varonīgi aptur bēgošu kartingu!

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtona pasaule kļūst daudz plašāka. Viņš izlaužas ārpus Vindzorgārdenas robežām un dodas arvien aizraujošākos piedzīvojumos. Braunu ģimene dodas atvaļinājumā uz jūras piekrasti, aicinot skatītājus uz brīnišķīgiem piedzīvojumiem, apmeklējot tādas jaunas vietas kā Dinozauru sala un pat melnais caurums. Un no Peru pie Padingtona ciemos atbrauc ļoti īpaša viešņa –Lūsijas tante!

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtonam ir grūti izvēlēties varoni īpašai foto sienai parkā. Varbūt viņam jāmeklē tuvāk mājām. Padingtons kļūst par varonīgu skeitbordistu, pateicoties Mateo un īpašai maskai, bet cik maģiska ir šī maska?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis grib iemācīt bērniem cept maizi, bet nekas nenotiek, kā plānots. Barbamazuļi iestāda avokado koku. Taču līdz ražai jāgaida vairāki gadi. Barbagudrajam ir ideja ietaupīt laiku.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must pass Wish Trials in Fairy World to prove theyre a match. Hazel crumbles under pressure, struggling to make a wish confidently, which leads to Cosmo and Wanda failing to grant her half-formed wishes. Consequently, Jorgen reassigns Hazel to a boisterous, no-nonsense fairy named Cookie, who only cares about efficiency, not accuracy. Displeased with the cookie-cutter nature of Cookies magic, Hazel must find a way to confidently wish for Cosmo and Wanda to be her fairies again. // Intimidated by her new classmates, Hazel wishes to be friends with the teachers instead. Once her wish is granted, she and the teachers play around the schoolyard and neglect to prep for the big test coming up. When test day arrives, Hazel realizes her wish has decreased the teachers maturity. Theyre acting like little kids! Hazel has to make a choice-keep her teacher friends and let the whole school fail or change them back and brave making new friends the hard way.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its picture day at school! And on top of that, theyre serving the most delicious pudding at lunchtime! Only problem is, Dev has control of the pudding supply and is hoarding it. Hazel takes the power back by wishing that everyone had an unlimited supply of pudding. Pudding is everywhere and Dev is out of business! But things take a turn when people cant stop eating it and turn into pudding zombies. Now Hazel not only has to save picture day, but also stop a pudding apocalypse!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its picture day at school! And on top of that, theyre serving the most delicious pudding at lunchtime! Only problem is, Dev has control of the pudding supply and is hoarding it. Hazel takes the power back by wishing that everyone had an unlimited supply of pudding. Pudding is everywhere and Dev is out of business! But things take a turn when people cant stop eating it and turn into pudding zombies. Now Hazel not only has to save picture day, but also stop a pudding apocalypse! // Hoping to win "Most Spirited Hair" for School Spirit Week, Hazel wishes her hair had spirit! Cosmo and Wanda take this literally and give her hair a spirit, bringing it to life as Diana the Diva! When Hazel and Diana "butt heads" over how best to showcase her, Diana runs away. Hazel chases her all over town but cant catch her. Later, Diana shows up at Hazels school aiming to enter the contest on her own. Hazel must find a way to reconcile with Diana if she hopes to win Diana back and win the contest.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Cosmo and Wanda grant a wish to make Hazels potato project work for the Science Fair, they rewrite the rules of science for the whole universe! When the physical world goes haywire as a result, they cant undo it because not even their magic is not working correctly! And Sci, the Science Fairy, refuses to help Hazel because he does not approve of her shortcut. Hazel must learn the real science behind her potato project to power up Cosmo and Wandas wands and set the universe right again. // After watching a detective TV show with her dad, Hazel wishes she could solve a mystery like a genuine gumshoe. At first, she is wrapped up in the thrill of solving a mystery, but things get real when the landlord goes missing. Everyone is a suspect - kids at school, the strange new neighbors, and even Cosmo and Wanda! Things intensify when Hazel suspects her family is the next target. In a dramatic climax at dinner at her neighbors, Hazel unveils the truth. Is it foul play? Or is it just her imagination?

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.desc: A fitness variety show shows Patrick how to exercise in Star-Robics, then in Whos the Dummy Now?, a family of dummies move into the Star home. ) 11:31 Kamp Koral The Jellyfish Kid. programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: On a fairy family trip to Fairy World, Dev convinces Hazel to steal Peris wand and explore Fairy World. Cosmo, Wanda and Peri sneak into Jorgens office and use his tracker to find them. Hazel and Dev end up stuck in the Un-Wish Zone, trapped by the Un-wish Dragon. Together they must battle the dragon and find their way back to their fairies before Jorgen finds out! // When band and orchestra tryouts happen at school, Hazel finds herself stuck in the middle of a rivalry between the two. Rather than choose a side, she wishes to be good at all instruments and ends up in both. Exhausted from the double life shes living, she wishes that the band and orchestra had nothing to be rivals about. In granting the wish, Cosmo and Wanda get rid of all music on Earth. Hazel, with the help of the Nmusic Phairy (silent N), must restore music to Earth and end this rivalry once and for all!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Winn, and Jasmine go to Patty Possums Party Playground, an entertainment fun zone for kids. Hazel wishes the animatronic Patty Possum would come to life. Patty joins the friends for the night and even brings them up to perform on stage! But at closing time, Patty doesnt want to lose her new friends, so she locks them inside the Party Playground. Cosmo and Wandas wands are stuck in the claw machine, so they cant help! They will have to evade this unhinged mascot without magic and find a way out. // Wanting Angela and Marcus to have a romantic anniversary, Hazel wishes that they would "fall in love all over again." When the wish causes her parents to forget each other, Hazel calls on Cupid to make them fall back in love. Upset that Hazel undid his work, Cupid challenges her to a competition in which Hazel and Marcus must compete with Cupid and Angelas old flame, Brewster, for Angelas affection. Can she beat Cupid at his own game and get her parents to fall back in love?

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick spawns an adorable mini-Patrick who quickly becomes the star of the show (until he outgrows the role). // The Star family celebrates the Klopnodian holiday Swaptoberfest by swapping identities with each other.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes to meet a dinosaur. Cosmo and Wanda bring Bary, a Baryonyx from the Cretaceous period, to present day. Hazel makes wishes to find Bary a job but unfortunately, Bary never quite fits in. Worse, his giant dinosaur tail knocks out power to the whole city, ruining Dimmadelphias prized Electric Light Ice Cream Float Parade. With Hazel feeling remorseful, Bary musters inspiration from his hero, the great Thomas Rex-ison, and uses his dinosaur smarts to try to save the day. // Hazel has planned a night of watching scary movies with her new friend, Jasmine, but it turns out Jasmine hates scary movies. Rather than change the plan, Hazel wishes Jasmine had no fears. When Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, the fears escape Jasmines mind, coming into the real world. Hazel tries fighting the fears off but learns its Jasmine who must face them to make them disappear. Now, shes got to talk her new friend into doing everything shes most afraid of, which gets the attention of Fear Itself!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hoping to win "Most Spirited Hair" for School Spirit Week, Hazel wishes her hair had spirit! Hazel must find a way to reconcile with Diana if she hopes to win Diana back and win the contest."

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazels feelings are hurt when her friends decide to go to the school dance instead of her book club. She storms off, but then realizes she wants to go to the dance too. Hazel wishes for Kennueth, a half-fish, half-man character from her favorite manga, to come out of his story and take her to the dance. Hazel must get through the dance before Kennueths true form, and magic, are revealed. // Hazel learns about the harmful effects of trash and pollution on Earth, so she wishes that people wouldnt be such trash monsters. Cosmo and Wanda summon a friendly, talking, trash eating dumpster named Danky! Together they spread the word about sustainability and caring for the earth. Then, Dale Dimmadome tricks Danky into helping him sell more products, making people even bigger trash monsters! Hazel must get Danky back and stop Dale Dimmadome in his wasteful tracks.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its Kindness Day! Mr. Guzman announces that if all students complete one act of kindness, theyll get a class pizza party-and Hazel wants that pizza! But when Dev refuses to participate, Cosmo and Wanda call on the Pe-Az, a trio of alien diplomats, to reason with him. Despite their best efforts, Dev outsmarts the Pe-Az and uses their alien technology to get rid of all the pizza on Earth. // Hazel must take matters into her own hands to get to the bottom of Devs surly attitude and save pizza! When Hazel makes a wish to understand why Dev acts the way he does, she gets paired with him for a class scavenger hunt. They struggle to work together, but, as the day goes on, they develop a friendship. However, that falls apart when Devs dad, Dale, belittles their effort, causing Dev to turn on Hazel again to save face. Will Dev be able to overcome his pride and finish the project, or will his issues with his dad tank both their grades?

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: The school is looking for a new mascot, and Chloe and her new friends think they can make an impression by designing the winning entry. Chloe, Jinx, and Booch create a costume they are excited about, leaving it at the beach house until the they can present it at school. Meanwhile, Phoebe learns that Max has gotten them jobs at the school, but while he has a cushy Vice Principal job, she is the new Art teacher. Their argument over this leads to accidentally destroying it the new mascot costume. After Chloe discovers what theyve done and is furious with them, Max and Phoebe realize that being her guardian comes with more responsibility than they imagined.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Dev is bummed at his own birthday party because his dad is off working. Hazel tries to cheer him up by wishing for a pair of rocket boots for him. He is stoked! Then, a party princess arrives, but this is no ordinary party princess, its VICKY from the original series. Meanwhile, Cosmo, Wanda, and Peri stumble into a secret room, where they discover that Dale has been investigating Hazel since Founders Day. Back at the party, Vicky, rotten as ever, forces the kids to make crafts for her online store instead of having fun. Hazel comes up with a plan full of zany traps to stop Vicky and take the party back! When Dev discovers his dad has been researching Hazel instead of spending time with him, Dev lashes out at Hazel and wishes Peri away. Left alone with his anger, is there a devious plan hatching in Devs mind?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: During a visit from Antony, Hazels wish lands them inside "Rattleconda Racers," a board game they invented. Once in the game, however, they bicker about the best way to play. Hazel wants to stick to the rules they used to play by, but Antony wants to make new ones. When the formidable Rhonda the Rattleconda takes off with Cosmo and Wanda, intending to make them her next meal, Hazel and Antony must confront the tension in their relationship to save them and escape the game! // When Hazel must give a presentation on what she wants to be when she grows up, she is excited to share her dreams of being a geologist! Wanting to wow her classmates, she wishes she could excavate an "out of this world" rock to show them. Cosmo and Wanda poof her underground to find a super special rock, and she does! But in the process, she angers a group of rock monsters and must use her knowledge of geology to win them over, get her rock back, and escape the cave!

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: When Granny Tentacles goes out for a spa day, Patrick volunteers to watch over her house. In a failed attempt to follow Grannys instructions, Patrick makes his way into her home, then brings Squidina inside too. Between breaking Grannys furniture, tearing out her toilet, and letting a wild animal out of its cage, Patrick destroys the entire house, just as Granny returns home to witness it. // Without seeing him, the Star family obliviously smashes up Plankton, leading him to forget who he is. When the injured, amnesic Plankton is saved and adopted by the Dartfish family, it does not take long for him to teach the overly polite family his evil ways. Meanwhile, Karen searches all over town for her missing husband.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes her apartment building were a luxury hotel for a sleepover, but finds herself too busy to enjoy it with friends. When Hazels wish for 1,500 minutes of fame angers Principal Krentz, she must find a way to speed up time.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Cosmo and Wanda grant a wish to make Hazels potato project work for the Science Fair, they rewrite the rules of science for the whole universe! When the physical world goes haywire as a result, they cant undo it because not even their magic is not working correctly! And Sci, the Science Fairy, refuses to help Hazel because he does not approve of her shortcut. Hazel must learn the real science behind her potato project to power up Cosmo and Wandas wands and set the universe right again.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

Jinx and Boochs parents want to meet with Chloes parents to discuss the lack of supervision at the beach house. With Hank and Barb away, Max and Phoebe are determined to prove they can be good guardians, and use a disguise gadget to transform into their parents to help Chloe. It goes well until the real Hank and Barb show up, and must transform into Max and Phoebe to keep the ruse going.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Canadian computer-animated television series Top Wing presents an exciting story of four courageous young birds, Swift, Penny, Brody, and Rod on Big Swirl Island. They are cadets at Top Wing Academy with the best of the best students and have access to the most advanced technology. By operating different vehicles like a submarine, a boat, a jet or a motorcycle, the cadets learn how to work as a team and are the first to rush to the rescue to those in trouble. Major lessons are learnt with the help of their mentor Speedy. With every new task performed the cadets become braver, stronger and smarter.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: "Pets Peeved: The notorious Vesuvius Twins have adopted Skipper and King Julien and brought the animals home to their luxury apartment. Not to spoil and pamper - but to fight each other over shiny baubles! The rest of the penguins and lemurs attempt a rescue but are captured themselves and made to perform in a painful "circus" the twins put together. The tables are going to need to be turned to get this circus out of town. Byte-Sized: Kowalski has another breakthrough invention, tiny robots that group together and not only fix broken tools and appliances, but run them as well. The penguins can just sit back and let the "Nanites" take care of all their chores! The problem is, the Nanites are programmed to protect the penguins at all costs, and ultimately seal the birds inside their lair. The only way to escape is to do battle with a giant, nasty, Nanite robot."

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Private has an arch enemy in the form of Dale the snail. Why does this snail hate Private so much? Its because Private allegedly smashed the little guy, and keeps smashing him albeit accidentally. Even a public apology ends with Dale getting crushed. Sadly, Dale should never have been enemies with Private to begin with - it was a different penguin who did him wrong. // King Julien becomes enamored of a giant toilet the penguins have built. He wants to use it as his new throne, only the toilet is actually a stink bomb the penguins built to trap Dr. Blowhole. Julien accidently gets trapped, bound tightly to the bomb, so the penguins must try to stop it from detonating, all while going on a wild truck chase through New York. They end up in a New Jersey dump, and Skipper must show a sensitive side before all is lost.

programme.desc: Dreads obsession with recapturing his shard overrules all reason. Rusty Rose agrees the shard is too powerful for any one person, including Sonic. Caught between captain and crew, Sonic fights for his life.

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Rebel Rouge and Renegade Knuckles walk the newly liberated streets of New Yoke City unsure whats next, but at least theyre free. Until... the Mothership redocks atop the YOKE, Sonic and Dread - stowaways - fall to the streets below, fates uncertain.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Nuts to You/The Terror of Madagascar Description : Nuts to You: Fred the Squirrel has hit the jackpot. He stumbles onto a jackpot oak tree which is loaded with acorns (thats tons of money to animal folk). Hes going to need financial advice, and who better to offer sound advice than King Julien? The two enter a partnership looking for ways to spend on the good life. The Red Squirrel has designs on the loot, though, and captures the hapless twosome in order to squeeze the acorns out of them. Will the evil squirrels precisely planned plot pay or get him played? The Terror of Madagascar: A special delivery has come from Madagascar. What is it? A baby Fossa! Everyone is enchanted by the little tyke except King Julien, who sees him as a lemur-devouring predator, and he has the toothmarks on his butt to prove it! Julien formulates a plan to get rid of the adorable little carnivore, but his slithery solution becomes much worse than the problem!

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Best Laid Plaintains: Its a special day when Bada and Bing get a shipment of delicious plantains to eat. Although they jealously guard the African bananas, King Juliens determined to taste them too. He sneaks into the gorilla habitat while they sleep, and he and Marlene end up eating a few too many for the gorillas not to notice. Like all of them. When they realize what theyve done they head for the hills as fast as their stolen car can take them. Can the penguins calm the savage beasts before they bash the banana bandits? P.E.L.T.: Skippers losing it. His performance on the obstacle course is actually slowing down, so he has to trigger a special fitness test to prove he can still lead the squad. Kowalski takes over as Skipper excuses himself to go on his fitness quest. The brainy bird appears to do a bang-up job in the leadership role - are Skippers days at the helm over but hes too chicken to admit it?

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks hinges on David Seville, a single father whose everyday struggle is to bring up his kids, 3 chipmunks: Alvin- the oldest brother, the leader, not so good at school, Simon- the smartest of the three brothers, exemplary pupil and Theodore- the youngest one, the chubby one, the gentle one. David "Dave" sometimes loses his temper and then he is shouting "Alvinnnnn!!!". Music is an obligatory pleasant part of every episode. Every episode touches up-to-date issues of both adults and kids from modern life like real problems at school, dating and so on. Thanks to their own foolishness chipmunks often find themselves in ridiculous situations and have to use their creativity to get out of a mess, that provides us with a good opportunity to enjoy their joyful adventures.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester decide Grumpy Pants needs more excitement and take him to have the most extreme cup of tea ever. // In this years Capture the Flag contest Best listens to other peoples ideas even if they havent got a war room.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: The twins go to great lengths to protect Bests enjoyment of his book and realize spoilers arent so bad after all. // Best and Bester may have jumped the line for the new fish restaurant, but once inside things take a dramatic turn.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Sharing isnt easy for the twins and after a particularly heated argument they decide split the treehouse in half. // In order to win a local gardening competition, Best attempts to grow a plant, and Bester decides to be a plant.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Its Best to the rescue when Besters phobia of camels threatens to de-rail her chances of being dance champ. // Best and Bester go busking, but will Best cope with competition and what happens when burgers and banjos collide?

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Bester finds that the only way to get her brothers attention when hes glued to the game, is to be in the game. // Best and Bester stage a crazy publicity stunt for Grafifis repair shop which has everyone fearing for their lives.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies
programme.desc: The series Bubble Guppies revolves around the underwater adventures of a group of mermaid-like preschoolers who life in the fictional underwater city of Bubbletucky. The episode starts with a sketch of Molly saying "Hi, its me Molly and its time for-" only to be stopped by Gil doing the subject of the show. When Gil or Molly says "Its time for Bubble Guppies!", the theme song starts. After the theme song, the Little Fish say the episodes name. Something happens when a character goes to school. After that, the school day begins and the Bubble Guppies say "Good morning, Mr. Grouper!". Later, the remaining Guppie tells Mr. Grouper about what happened earlier. He states "Lets think about it," and the characters discuss the topic. The pop song for the episode then begins.One of the Guppies will go to a shop that mostly focuses on the topic. The owner of the shop will asks questions about what he or she needs. Later, Mr. Grouper comes into the shop and says its time for lunch, and the "Lunchtime" song plays. At lunch the characters make a food joke about the subject of the episode. After lunch, another Gil and Molly sketch is shown. The Guppies do something fun which leads Mr. Grouper talking more about the topic, which leads into a dancing song. Mr. Grouper then says its time to go outside, the "Outside" song plays, and the Guppies make up a story about the topic. After this, Gil and Molly do another sketch.The Guppies go on a field trip that focuses on the topic, and the show concludes with the last Gil and Molly sketch and a shorter version of the theme song.

programme.title: Breadwinners
programme.desc: Two ducks with thin legs and round faces, SwaySway and Buhdeuce, are best friends. They fly around the water-based planet Pondgea in a rocket-powered van and deliver fresh bread to its citizens. They often find themselves in awkward and funny situations, and sometimes their workdays are quite dangerous. They find new friends, deal with opponents and have fun, making sure Pondgea always receive fresh bread on time.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Kowalskis obsession with Doris the dolphin drives him to invent a love ray, the Love-U-Laser. It works like a charm until Alice falls for a trashcan, Julien falls for Mort, and Skipper orders the ray to be put in reverse. Private gets hit by the reverse ray and instantly loathes Kowalski. Matters get much worse as the loathe ray explodes and everybody hates Kowalski! Hes only got one shot to stop being the most loathed penguin in the world. // Told as a courtroom flashback, Kowalski unwisely revives Jiggles in a small, whipped cream-eating version. The little green cubes multiply on impact, however, and are soon threatening to cover the surface of the earth. As the Jiggli multiply out of control, will the team be able to prevent the jiggli-fication of the world?

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Commissioner flips his lid, literally. His toupee blows off and sticks to Maurice, who also gets red cheeks and a skinned tail, all by accident. Julien and Mort chase him with sticks, intent on beating the "monster" stuck to Maurices head. The baboon ladies take Maurice in, protecting and pampering him because they mistakenly think hes a male baboon. Its up to the penguins to get the toupee back and restore it to its rightful scalp. // Shelly the ostrich gets stuck in drying cement and only Rico can save her. Shelly falls for him hard as a result, however, Ricos heart forever belongs to his doll. Shelly swipes the doll and tries hard to win his heart, but Rico doesnt budge and his doll is accidently hauled off in a recycle truck. The penguins give chase but are left hopelessly in the dust. Shelly, wanting to make amends, tosses them on her back and sprints after the truck - can she possibly catch it?

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: "The Most Dangerous Game Night:Marlene plans a game night to help the zoo animals bond but it takes a terrible turn when the snacks run out. While Kowalski, Maurice, and Mort go on a snack run the gaming animals begin to fight over the games - cheating, sore losing, unwilling participation… chaos! The snack runners get trapped by the law at the store, and the zoo animals have to reconcile quickly in order to pull off a risky rescue. This isnt the kind of bonding Marlene had in mind! Street Smarts: Elmer the dog wants a friend, and thinks he found one in Mort. The penguins are compelled to rescue him, but Elmer doesnt want to give the little lemur up! Max the cat is recruited to help, and Max uses his dog expertise to lead the boys to the giant dog. Mort is rescued, but at what cost? The penguins think Max has met his slobbery doom in the jaws of the giant mastiff."

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: "Time Out: Kowalskis invention that stops time falls into the worst hands possible. King Juliens. The lemur promptly breaks it trapping the two of them in a world frozen in time. Instead of being a disaster, however, they realize they can do everything their hearts desire invent like crazy, perform on Broadway, play tennis in the middle of the street. But even an infinite playland like this cant last forever! Our Man in Grrfurjiclestan: Special Agent Buck Rockgut makes a "triumphant" return. While hunting the Red Squirrel across the globe, the crusty old bird contacts the penguins with a warning that the diabolical squirrel has a brainwashed sleeper agent among them. They battle each other to a standstill to uncover the agent - will it tear the unit apart? Can trust ever be restored? They have to take a trip to a faraway borough to uncover the truth."

programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: Sonic Prime

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Sonic tells Nine about Ghost Hill, its shard, and its blueprint to reassemble the Paradox Prism to restart the real world. But all Nine hears is: theres a fourth shard. Nine wants it to fix the world.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks hinges on David Seville, a single father whose everyday struggle is to bring up his kids, 3 chipmunks: Alvin- the oldest brother, the leader, not so good at school, Simon- the smartest of the three brothers, exemplary pupil and Theodore- the youngest one, the chubby one, the gentle one. David "Dave" sometimes loses his temper and then he is shouting "Alvinnnnn!!!". Music is an obligatory pleasant part of every episode. Every episode touches up-to-date issues of both adults and kids from modern life like real problems at school, dating and so on. Thanks to their own foolishness chipmunks often find themselves in ridiculous situations and have to use their creativity to get out of a mess, that provides us with a good opportunity to enjoy their joyful adventures.
